src: AOL har kunnet bevege seg og utvikle IM-markedet i sin egen hastighet frem til nå på grunn av sin utbredte bruk innenfor USA. Med denne ordningen satt i gang kan det være en ende på friheten. Antall brukere av Yahoo! og Microsoft-tjenestene kombinert vil slå antall AOL-kunder.
mt: AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market in its own pace until now due to its widespread use within the US. With this order in place, it may be the end of freedom. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will beat the number of AOL users.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: I går formiddag gikk en bilbombe av ved politihovedkvarteret i Gaziantep i Tyrkia i går formiddag. To politibetjenter ble drept og mer enn 20 andre mennesker ble skadet. I følge sysselmannens kontor var nitten av de skadde politibetjenter. Politiet fortalte de mistenker at en påstått Daesh-kriger (ISIL) var ansvarlig for angrepet.
mt: 19:00 UTC, 24. juli 2016: Yesterday morning, a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, yesterday morning. Two police officers were killed and more than 20 other people were injured. According to the governor's office, nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected a purported Daesh fighter (ISIL) was responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Tidligere Massachusetts-guvernør Mitt Romney vant det republikanske partiets presidentvalget på tirsdag med over 46 prosent av stemmene. Den tidligere amerikanske taleren i Representantenes hus, Newt Gingrich, kom på andreplass med 32 prosent. Som vinneren tar alt-stat ga Florida tildelt hele 50 av sine delegater til Romney, og han ble favoritt til den republikanske partinominasjonen.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's presidential primary on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the votes. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As the winner of the all-state contest, Florida was awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, making him the favorite for the Republican Party nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Tidligere House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas-guvernør Rick Perry, og kongressdame Michele Bachmann fullførte på henholdsvis 4., 5., og 6. plass. Gingrich skryter av Santorum etter å ha sett resultatene, men hadde krasse ord for Romney, på vegne av negative kampanjeannonser som ble sendt i Iowa mot Gingrich. Perry uttalte at han ville «dra tilbake til Texas for å vurdere resultatene etter kveldens nominasjonsmøte for å avgjøre om han hadde en vei videre i løpet», men han sa senere at han kom til å fortsette og være med å konkurrere i primærvalget den 21. januar i Carolina. Bachmann bestemte seg for å avslutte valgkampen sin, selv om hun vant Ames-halmavstemning i august.
mt: 4th place finisher Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann completed in 4th, 5th, and 6th place respectively. Gingrich gloated over Santorum after seeing the results, but had harsh words for Romney, on behalf of negative campaign ads that were sent in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to consider the results of tonight's caucus meeting to decide if he had a way forward in the race", but later decided to continue and compete in the primary on January 21 in Carolina. Bachmann decided to end her campaign, even though she won the Ames straw poll in August.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Stasjonens nettsider beskriver serien som «old school-radioteater med et nytt og skandaløst nerdete preg!». I sine tidlige dager var programmet aktuelt kun på den langvarige nettradioen TogiNet Radio, et nettsted fokusert på radioprat. På slutten av året 2015 ble AstroNet Radio etablert av TogiNet som en datterselskapsstasjon. Showet hadde opprinnelig med lokale amatørskuespillere fra Øst-Texas.
mt: The station's website describes the series as "old school radio theater with a new and scandalously nerdy twist!" In its early days, the program was relevant only on the long-running net radio TogiNet Radio, a website focused on radio drama. At the end of 2015, AstroNet Radio was established by TogiNet as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured local amateur actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Den 26. november 2008 kom Mumbai-angriperne frem via båt. De hadde granater og automatvåpen med seg og traff flere mål, blant annet Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus-jernbanestasjonen som var full av mennesker, og det berømte Taj Mahal-hotellet. David Headleys speider- og informasjonssamling hadde hjulpet til med å aktivere operasjonen til ti væpnede menn fra den pakistanske militærgruppen Laskhar-e-Taiba. Angrepet skapte stor spenning i forholdet mellom India og Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by boat. They had grenades and automatic weapons and hit several targets, including Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station which was full of people, and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's spy and information gathering had helped activate the operation of ten armed men from the Pakistani military group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack created great tension in the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Nadal stilling mot kanadieren er 7–2. Nylig tapte han mot Raonic i Brisbane Open. I kampen fikk Nadal åttiåtte prosent nettopoeng og vant 76 poeng i den første serven. Kongen av Clay sa etter kampen: «Jeg bare gleder meg til å returnere i de siste rundene av de avgjørende hendelsene. Jeg er til stede for å forsøke å vinne dette».
mt: 7–2 against the Canadian. Recently he lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. In the match Nadal had 88 percent nettopoeng and won 76 points in the first serve. King of Clay said after the match: «I just look forward to returning in the last rounds of the decisive events. I am present to try to win this».
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Naked News annonserte forrige uke at de ville øke det internasjonale språkmandatet sitt til nyhetsrapportering med hele tre nye kringkastinger. Den verdensomspennende organisasjonen som allerede har sendinger på engelsk og japansk, lanserer spanske, italienske og koreanske programmer for TV, internett og mobile enheter.
mt: Naked News announced last week that they would increase their international language mandate to news reporting with three new broadcasters. The worldwide organization that already has broadcasts in English and Japanese, launches Spanish, Italian and Korean programs for TV, internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Carpanedo konkurrerte i 2 individuelle løp i mesterskapet i tillegg til onsdagens arrangement. Hennes første gren var Slalåm, men hun fullførte ikke rennet. Det var 36 av 116 konkurrenter som ikke fullførte slalåmrennet. I hennes andre løp kjørte hun inn til tiendeplass i kvinnenes sittegruppe med en kombinert kjøretid på 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutter tregere enn østerrikske Claudia Loesch på førsteplass og 1:09.02 minutter etter Gøngyi Dani fra Ungarn på niendeplass. I kvinnenes sittende gruppe var det fire skiløpere som ikke klarte å fullføre rennet, og 45 av de totalt 117 utøverne i storslalåm klarte ikke å avansere.
mt: Carpanedo competed in two individual events at the championships in addition to Wednesday's event. Her first event was Slalom, but she did not finish the race. It was 36 of 116 competitors who did not finish the slalom race. In her second event she skied in to tenth place in the women's sit group with a combined time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than Austrian Claudia Loesch on first place and 1:09.02 minutes after Gøngyi Dani from Hungary on ninth place. In the women's sitting group there were four skiers who did not manage to finish the race, and 45 of the total 117 competitors in giant slalom did not advance.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: USAs NBA (National Basketball Association) suspenderte på onsdag sin profesjonelle basketballsesong grunnet bekymringer rundt COVID-19. Beslutningen fra NBA førte til at en jazzspiller i Utah testet positivt for COVID-19-viruset.
mt: On Wednesday, the NBA (National Basketball Association) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns over COVID-19. The decision from the NBA led to a jazz player in Utah testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: USAs NBA (National Basketball Association) suspenderte på onsdag sin profesjonelle basketballsesong grunnet bekymringer rundt COVID-19. Beslutningen fra NBA førte til at en jazzspiller i Utah testet positivt for COVID-19-viruset.
mt: On Wednesday, the NBA (National Basketball Association) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns over COVID-19. The decision from the NBA led to a jazz player in Utah testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Alex Ovechkin fra Washington Capitals er dagens spiller. Han hadde to mål og to målgivende i Washingtons 5–3 seier over Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkins første hjelpeskudd den kvelden var på målet som vant kampen av nybegynner Nicklas Backstrøm; det andre målet hans den kvelden var hans 60. den sesongen, og han ble slik den første spiller til å score 60 eller flere mål i en og samme sesong siden 1995-96, da både Jaromir Jagr og Mario Lemieux nådde den samme milepælen.
mt: Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals was today's player. He had two goals and two assists in Washington's 5–3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the goal that won the game for rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a single season since 1995-96, when both Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux reached the same milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Etter at det ble avslørt at banken Northern Rock hadde fått nødstøtte fra regjeringen i Storbritannia, ble firmaet nasjonalisert i 2008 . Northern Rock hadde nødvendig støtte på grunn av sin eksponering under subprime-krisen i 2007. Sir Richard Bransons Virgin Group hadde et bud som banken avviste før nasjonaliseringen av banken. Under nasjonaliseringen i 2010, ble den gjeldende hovedgatebanken, Northern Rock plc, skilt ut fra den «dårlige» delen av Northern Rock plc (eiendomsforvaltning). Virgin har bare kjøpt banken Northern Rock, ikke ressursforvaltningsselskapet.
mt: 2008, after it was revealed that the bank Northern Rock had received emergency support from the British government, the company was nationalized in 2008. Northern Rock had needed support due to its exposure under the subprime crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid that the bank rejected before the nationalization of the bank. During the nationalization in 2010, the existing main street bank, Northern Rock plc, was separated from the "bad" part of Northern Rock plc (property management). Virgin has only bought the bank Northern Rock, not the resource management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Rudds beslutning om å signere Kyotoprotokollen isolerer USA, som nå vil være det eneste industrilandet som ikke anerkjenner avtalen. Den tidligere konservative regjeringen i Australia avslår å ratifisere Kyoto med begrunnelsen at det kommer til å ødelegge økonomien med dens store avhengighet av kulleksport, mens land som India og Kina ikke var knyttet mot noen utslippsmål.
mt: Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol isolates the United States, which will now be the only industrialized country not to recognize the agreement. The former conservative government in Australia rejects ratifying Kyoto with the justification that it will destroy the economy with its large dependence on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not tied to any emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Skyttere i den supplerende skadedyrbekjempelsen ble nøye overvåket av skogvoktere, dette medførte at rettssaken ble overvåket og dens effektivisering evaluert. I samarbeid med NPWS og Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, rekrutterte man kvalifiserte frivillige til Sporting Shooters Associations programmet for jakt. Ifølge Mick O'Flynn, fungerende direktør for konservering og arv hos NPWS, fikk de fire skytterne for den første skyteoperasjonen omfattende sikkerhets- og treningsinstrukser.
mt: Shooters in the supplementary pest control were carefully monitored by forest rangers, this resulted in the trial being monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In collaboration with NPWS and Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited to Sporting Shooters Associations hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, acting director of conservation and heritage at NPWS, the four shooters for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Basert på dette fossilet, betyr det at splittelsen var mye tidligere enn hva som har vært antatt ut ifra molekylære sporene. «Dette betyr at alt må bli lagt tilbake», sa forsker ved Rift Valley Forskningstjeneste i Etiopia og en medskribent av undersøkelsen, Berhane Asfaw.
mt: Based on this fossil, it means that the split was much earlier than has been assumed based on molecular traces. "This means that everything must be put back," said a researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: På torsdagens keynote-presentasjon av Tokyo Game Show, avduket Nintendos president Satoru Iwata designet av kontrolleren for selskapets nye Nintendo Revolution-konsoll. Kontrollenheten, som ligner en fjernkontroll til TV, bruker to sensorer som er plassert nær brukerens TV for å triangulere posisjonen sin i et tredimensjonalt rom. Dette gjør at spillere kan styre handlinger og bevegelser ved å flytte enheten gjennom luften.
mt: On Thursday's keynote presentation of Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the controller for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. The controller unit, which resembles a TV remote control, uses two sensors placed near the user's TV to triangulate its position in a three-dimensional space. This allows players to control actions and movements by moving the unit through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Det kinesiske nyhetsbyrået Xinhua meldte tidligere fra om at et fly var kapret. Det ble senere rapportert at flyet fikk en bombetrussel og ble veiledet mot retur til Afghanistan med landing i Kandahar. Ifølge de første rapportene ble flyet dirigert tilbake til Afghanistan etter å ha blitt nektet nødlanding i Ürümqi.
mt: The Chinese news agency Xinhua reported earlier that a plane had been hijacked. It was later reported that the plane was threatened with a bomb and was guided back to Afghanistan with a landing in Kandahar. According to the first reports, the plane was directed back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Mandag kunne ikke Sara Danius, fast sekretær i Nobelkomiteen for litteratur hos det svenske akademiet, offentlig kunngjort under et radioprogram i Sverige, komme i kontakt med Bob Dylan om at han vant 2016s Nobelpris for litteratur, og hadde gitt opp å nå ham. Danius forteller: «For tiden gjør vi ikke noe. Jeg har ringt og sendt e-post til hans nærmeste samarbeidspartner og mottok høflige svar. Det er mer enn nok for nå».
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature winner Bob Dylan could not be reached by Sara Danius, secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, on Monday, and she gave up trying. Danius said, "For now, we're not doing anything. I've called and emailed his closest collaborator and received polite replies. That's more than enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Presidenten i USA, George W. Bush, ønsket kunngjøringen velkommen. Bush sin talsmann, Gordon Johndroe, kalte Nord-Koreas løfte «et svært skritt på veien til målet om å oppnå verifiserbart denuklarering av den koreanske halvøya».
mt: President of the United States, George W. Bush, welcomed the announcement. Bush's spokesman, Gordon Johndroe, called North Korea's pledge "a very important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula".
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: Słania flyttet til Sverige i 1956, hvor han tre år senere begynte å jobbe for det svenske postvesenet og ble deres sjefsgravør. Han laget mer enn 1000 frimerker for Sverige, samt 28 andre land. Arbeidet hans er av en slik anerkjent kvalitet og detaljen at han er en av de svært få «kjente navnene» blant filatelister. Noen spesialiserer seg på å samle inn arbeidet hans alene. Det tusende stempelet hans var den storslåtte «Great Deeds by Swedish Kings» av David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl i 2000, som er registrert i Guinness verdensrekordbok. Han var også opptatt med gravering av sedler for mange land, ferske eksempler på arbeidene hans er statsministerportrettene på forsiden av de nye kanadiske 5- og 100-dollarsedlene.
mt: Șlania moved to Sweden in 1956, where three years later he began working for the Swedish postal service and became their chief engraver. He designed more than 1000 stamps for Sweden, as well as 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "known names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His thousandth stamp was the grand "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is registered in the Guinness World Records. He was also involved in engraving banknotes for many countries, fresh examples of his work are the prime minister portraits on the front of the new Canadian 5- and 100-dollar bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Over 800 amerikanske mil av Trans-Alaska-rørledningen måtte stenges av etter at det rant ut råolje fra tusenvis av oljefat sør for Fairbanks i Alaska. En strømforsyningsfeil etter en rutinemessig brannsystemtest forårsaket at avlastingsventiler åpnet og råolje overstrømmet nær Fort Greely pumpestasjon 9. Ventilene åpnet seg og tillot et trykkutslipp for systemet, oljen strømmet over en flate til en tank som kan holde 55 000 fat (8,7 millioner liter). Onsdag ettermiddag lakk tankventilene fortsatt fra varmeutvidelse inne i tanken. Et annet avgrensningsområde under tanksene som kan holde 104 500 fat var ennå ikke fylt til sin kapasitet.
mt: 800+ miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System had to be shut down after thousands of oil drums leaked near Fort Greely pump station 9. A power outage caused by a routine fire suppression system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed onto a flat surface to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (8.7 million liters). Wednesday afternoon, tank vents were still leaking from heat expansion inside the tank. Another containment area under the tanks that can hold 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to its capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: USAs ingeniørkorps har anslått at 6 tommer kan bryte de allerede ødelagte dikene. Den niende avdelingen, som så oversvømmelse så høy som 20 britiske fot under orkanen Katrina, befinner seg for øyeblikket i vann opp til hoftehøyde ettersom den nærliggende dalen har blitt overflommet. Vann renner over vollen i en seksjon som er 100 britiske fot bred.
mt: 6 inches of rain has been estimated to break the already damaged levees. The 9th division, which saw flooding as high as 20 British feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in water up to waist height as the nearby valley has been overflown. Water is flowing over the berm in a section that is 100 British feet wide.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton bekreftet at pasienten ble innlagt på Howard universitetssykehus og er i en stabil tilstand. Pasienten hadde vært i Nigeria der det har vært tilfeller av Ebola-viruset. Sykehuset fulgte protokoll for infeksjonskontroll, inkludert det å skille pasienten fra de andre for å hindre at de andre ble smittet.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the patient was admitted to Howard University Hospital and is in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria where there have been cases of Ebola virus. The hospital followed infection control protocols, including separating the patient from others to prevent them from being infected.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kometer var kanskje årsaken til vann på jorden, i tillegg til økologisk materie som kan danne proteiner og støtte liv. Siden kometer kolliderte med Jorden for lenge siden håper forskere å forstå hvordan planeter dannes, spesielt med tanke på Jorden.
mt: Comets may have been the cause of water on Earth, in addition to organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Since comets collided with Earth long ago, researchers hope to understand how planets are formed, especially with regard to Earth.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Myndighetene er usikre på trusselens troverdighet, men Maryland Transportation Authority foretok stenging på oppfordring fra FBI. Inngangene til t-banen ble sperret med tippbiler og 80 politikonstabler var i beredskap for å omdirigere motorisert trafikk. Det ble ikke meldt om store trafikkforsinkelser på omkjøringsveien, kommunens alternative vei.
mt: Authorities are unsure of the threat's credibility, but the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the airport on the FBI's recommendation. The entrances to the subway were blocked with dump trucks and 80 police officers were on standby to re-route motorized traffic. There were no reports of major traffic delays on the Beltway, the county's alternative route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Fotografen ble transportert til det medisinske senteret Ronald Reagan UCLA, der han etter hvert døde. Han var mest sannsynlig i 20-årene. I en uttalelse fortalte Bieber, «På tross av at jeg ikke var til stede eller direkte involvert i denne triste ulykken så går tankene og bønnene mine til offerets familie». Underholdningsnyheter TMZ har forstått det som at fotografen stoppet kjøretøyet sitt på den andre siden av Sepulveda Boulevard og prøvde å ta bilder av en bil som hadde blitt stoppet av politiet før han krysset veien og fortsatte, politibetjenten fra trafikkpolitiet i California som hadde stoppet bilen beordret ham to ganger tilbake på andre siden. Politiet har informert om at føreren av kjøretøyet som kjørte på fotografen ikke kommer til å bli stilt for retten.
mt: The photographer was transported to the medical center Ronald Reagan UCLA, where he eventually died. He was most likely in his 20s. In a statement Bieber said, "Despite the fact that I was not present or directly involved in this tragic accident, my prayers and thoughts go out to the family of the victim, as well as my fans who have stood by my side." Entertainment news TMZ has understood that the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to take pictures of a car that had been stopped by the police before he crossed the road and continued, the police officer from the California Department of Motor Vehicles who had stopped the car ordered him twice back on the other side. Police have informed that the driver of the car that ran over the photographer will not be charged.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Presidentminister Rodrigo Aria sa at Arias testet positivt for et mildt tilfelle av viruset. Tilstanden til presidenten er stabil, selv om han vil være i hjemmeisolasjon i flere dager. Bortsett fra feberen og en sår hals, føler jeg meg frisk og i god form til å utføre arbeidet mitt hjemmefra. «Jeg regner med å kunne vende tilbake til alle forpliktelsene mine på mandag», sa Arias i en uttalelse.
mt: President Rodrigo Aria said that he tested positive for a mild case of the virus. The president's condition is stable, even though he will be in home isolation for several days. "I expect to be able to return to all my duties on Monday," Aria said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Den tropiske syklonen Gonu som er navngitt etter en bag med blader fra en palme på det maldiviske språket, nådde en vind på 240 km i timen på sitt verste. I dag tidlig var vindkastene nede i rundt 83 km/t, og det var forventet at de ville fortsette å svekkes.
mt: Tropical cyclone Gonu, named after a palm frond bag in the Maldivian language, reached a wind speed of 240 km/h at its worst. Early today, wind gusts were down to around 83 km/h, and it was expected that they would continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Rødt tidevann skyldes en høyere enn normal konsentrasjon av Karenia brevis, en encellet maritim organisme som oppstår naturlig. Naturlige faktorer kan blandes sammen for å produsere ideelle relasjoner, slik at antallet av denne algen øker kraftig. Algene produserer en nervegift som kan skade nerver hos både mennesker og fisk. Fisk dør ofte på grunn av høye konsentrasjoner av giftstoffer i hav-vannet. Folk kan bli påvirket av å puste inn påvirket vann inntatt fra luften gjennom vind og bølger.
mt: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism that occurs naturally. Natural factors can be combined to produce ideal relationships, so that the number of this algae increases greatly. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can harm nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die due to high concentrations of toxic substances in sea water. People can be affected by inhaling affected water taken in through the air by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, som opprinnelig var en storm i kategori på skalaen til Safgran-Simpsons orkanskala, ble svekket til et tropisk lavtrykk før den forsvant på tirsdag. Restene produserte regnskyll over de fleste øyene, men ennå har det ikke blitt rapportert om skader eller flom. Regnfallet, som nådde 6,34 tommer på en måler på Oahu, ble beskrevet som «gunstig». Noe av regnet ble etterfulgt av torden og gjentatte lyn.
mt: Felicia, which was originally a storm in category on the Safgran-Simpsons scale, was weakened to a tropical depression before it disappeared on Tuesday. The remnants produced rain showers over most of the islands, but there have been no reports of damage or flooding yet. The rainfall, which reached 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "favorable". Some of the rain was followed by thunder and repeated lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: I 2008 styrtet Piquet jr. i Singapore Grand Prix rett etter en tidlig stopp for Fernando Alonso for å hente ut sikkerhetsbilen. Mens bilene foran Alonso dro inn for fylle drivstoff under sikkerhetsbilen, avanserte han oppover for å ta seieren. Piquet Jr. ble avskjediget etter Ungarn Grand Prix i 2009.
mt: 2008, Piquet Jr. crashed in Singapore Grand Prix after an early stop for Fernando Alonso to pick up the safety car. While the cars in front of Alonso were filling up the safety car, he advanced up to take the win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: En studie publisert på torsdag i journalen Science rapporterte om dannelse av en ny fugleart på Galápagos-øyene i Ecuador. Forskere fra Princeton University i USA og Uppsala Universitet i Sverige informerte om nye arter hadde utviklet seg på bare to generasjoner, skjønt mange hadde trodd at denne prosessen ville ta mye lengre tid på grunn av avling mellom endemisk Darwinfink, Mellomjordspurv, og kaktusspurven-innvandreren Storkaktusspurv.
mt: A study published in the journal Science on Thursday reported the creation of a new bird species on the Galápagos Islands in Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that new species had developed in just two generations, although many had thought that this process would take much longer due to breeding between endemic Darwin's finches, the medium ground finch, and the invasive large ground finch.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Det kunstneriske arrangementet er også en del av en kampanje som er sendt ut av Bucharest-rådhuset for å restituere bildet av den rumenske hovedstaden som et kreativt og fargerikt metropol. Byen vil være den 1. i sør-Øst-Europa til å arrangere CowParade, den største offentlige kunsthendelsen globalt, mellom juni og august dette året.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign sent out by the Bucharest City Hall to restore the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. Bucharest will be the first city in South-East Europe to host CowParade, the largest public art event globally, between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Flyet var på vei mot Irkutsk og ble operert av interne tropper. Det ble etablert en undersøkelse for å undersøke. Helt siden 1970-tallet har Il-76 vært en hovedkomponent i både det russiske og sovjetiske militæret, og var allerede med i en alvorlig ulykke i Russland forrige måned. Den syvende oktober løsnet en motor under avgang uten at noen ble skadet. Russland innførte flyforbud for Il-76s i en kort periode etter ulykken.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was operated by the Russian Air Force. An investigation was established to investigate. Since the 1970s, the Il-76 has been a main component in both the Russian and Soviet militaries, and was already involved in a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, a motor failed during takeoff without anyone being injured. Russia imposed a flight ban for Il-76s in a short period after the accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Flyet var på vei mot Irkutsk og ble operert av interne tropper. Det ble etablert en undersøkelse for å undersøke. Helt siden 1970-tallet har Il-76 vært en hovedkomponent i både det russiske og sovjetiske militæret, og var allerede med i en alvorlig ulykke i Russland forrige måned. Den syvende oktober løsnet en motor under avgang uten at noen ble skadet. Russland innførte flyforbud for Il-76s i en kort periode etter ulykken.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was operated by the Russian Air Force. An investigation was established to investigate. Since the 1970s, the Il-76 has been a main component in both the Russian and Soviet militaries, and was already involved in a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, a motor failed during takeoff without anyone being injured. Russia imposed a flight ban for Il-76s in a short period after the accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Før The Simpsons hadde Simon arbeidet med flere serier, og hatt ulike posisjoner. Han arbeidet med serier som Taxi, Cheers og The Tracy Ullman Show gjennom 1980-årene. I 1989 skapte han The Simpsons med Brooks og Groening, samt ansatte showets første skriveteam. Han fortsatte å ha tittelen som utøvende produsent selv når han forlot programmet i 1993, og fortsatte å motta titalls millioner dollar hver sesong i godtgjørelser for bruk.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on several series, and held various positions. He worked on series such as Taxi, Cheers and The Tracy Ullman Show in the 1980s. In 1989 he created The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and hired the show's first writing staff. He continued to hold the title of executive producer even after he left the program in 1993, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars per season in royalties.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke skrev at innsatsen som noen la ned for å utelukke kvinner fra å snakke ut angående kvinners helse var forgjeves. Hun kom frem til dette etter flere positive kommentarer og oppmuntringer som ble tilsendt henne fra både kvinnelige og mannlige personer som ønsker at prevensjonsmidler bør bli sett på som en medisinsk nødvendighet.
mt: Fluke wrote that the effort to exclude women from speaking out about women's health was futile. She came to this conclusion after receiving several positive comments and encouragements from both female and male individuals who want contraceptives to be seen as a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

mt: Fluke wrote that the effort to exclude women from speaking out about women's health was futile. She came to this conclusion after receiving several positive comments and encouragements from both female and male individuals who want contraceptives to be seen as a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Det kommer til å oppføre seg som vann og er transparent i likhet med vann. Så hvis du sto ved vannkanten, ville du kunne se ned til hva det måttevære av småstein eller gjørme som lå på bunnen. «Det finnes kun én planet så vidt vi vet, som viser mer dynamikk enn Titan, og navnet på den er Jorden», la Stofan til.
mt: It will behave like water and be transparent like water. So if you were standing at the water's edge, you would be able to see down to what it might be of small stones or mud that lay on the bottom. "There is only one planet we know of that shows more dynamism than Titan, and the name of that planet is Earth," Stofan said.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Dette bekrefter ikke bare at enkelte dinosaurer hadde fjær, en teori som allerede er populær, men viser detaljer som fossiler som regel ikke har mulighet til å vise, som f.eks. farger og tredimensjonal ordning. . Forskere sier at fjærdrakten til dette dyret var kastanjebrun på toppen med en blek eller en karotenoid farge på undersiden. Oppdagelsen gir i tillegg innsikt i utviklingen for fjær hos fugler. Fordi dinosaurfjærene ikke har en velutviklet sjakt som kalles for rachis, men har andre funksjoner for fjærer – mothaker og hylster – antok forskerne at rachis trolig var en senere evolusjonær utvikling slik som de andre relevante funksjonene. Fjærens struktur tyder på at de ikke ble brukt til å fly, men heller for temperaturregulering eller utseende. Forskerne foreslo at, selv om dette er halen til en ung dinosaur, viser eksempelprøven voksen fjærdrakt og ikke kyllingsdun. Forskerne antydet at, selv om dette var halen til en dinosaur, viste prøven fjærdrakten til en voksen og ikke en kyllings dun.
mt: This not only confirms that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that is already popular, but shows details that fossils usually cannot show, such as colors and three-dimensional ordering. Researchers say that the feather coat of this animal was chestnut brown on top with a pale or carotenoid color on the underside. The discovery also provides insight into the development of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft called the rachis, but have other functions for feathers – mothaker and hylster – researchers assumed that the rachis was probably a later evolutionary development as the other relevant functions. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or appearance. Researchers suggested that, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows the adult feather coat and not the down of a chick. Researchers suggested that, although this was the tail of a dinosaur, the sample showed the adult feather coat and not the down of a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Selv om en eksperimentell vaksine ser ut til å kunne redusere dødeligheten til Ebola, har ingen medisiner frem til å nå blitt klarert for å kunne behandle eksisterende infeksjon. ZMapp er en cocktail av antistoffer som i utgangspunktet var lovende i dette feltet, men formelle studier indikerte at den gav mindre gevinster enn hva man hadde håpet på i sitt arbeid for å forhindre død. I PALM-forsøket ble ZMapp benyttet som en kontroll, noe som betyr at forskere brukte det som hovedlinje og sammenlignet de tre andre behandlingene til det.
mt: Although an experimental vaccine appears to reduce the death rate from Ebola, no medications have yet been cleared to treat existing infections. ZMapp is a cocktail of antibodies that initially appeared promising in this field, but formal studies indicated that it provided less benefit than hoped in its work to prevent death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that researchers used it as the main line and compared the three other treatments to it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Forskere fra Stanford University School of Medicine gjorde kunngjørelsen på mandag om oppfinnelsen av et nytt diagnoseverktøy som sorterer celler etter type: en ørliten utskrivbar chip kan produseres ved hjelp av standard inkjettskrivere for muligens ca. én amerikansk cent hver. Forskningslederne forteller at dette kan forårsake raskere oppdagelse av kreft, tuberkulose, hiv og malaria for pasienter i lavinntektsland, der overlevelsesgraden for sykdommer som brystkreft kan være halvparten av det den er i de rikere landene.
mt: Researchers from Stanford University School of Medicine announced on Monday the invention of a new diagnostic tool that sorts cells by type: a tiny printable chip can be produced using standard inkjet printers for possibly less than a dollar each. The research leaders say this could lead to faster detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria for patients in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases such as breast cancer can be half of what they are in wealthier countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Forskere har funnet landformasjoner spredt over månens overflate som kalles for lobate helninger, som tilsynelatende skyldes at månen krymper veldig sakte. Disse skjerpene har blitt observert rundt hele månen og de ser ut til å være lite forvitret, noe som viser til at de geologiske hendelsene de kommer fra er ganske nylige. Denne teorien motsier påstanden om at månen er helt fri for geologisk aktivitet.
mt: Researchers have found landforms spread across the moon's surface called lobate escarpments, which apparently result from the moon's very slow contraction. These scarps have been observed around the entire moon and appear to be little weathered, indicating that the geological events they result from are quite recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely free of geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya har siden vært i Edinburghs domstol tiltalt for å ha drept sønnen sin. Hun er varetektsfengslet og venter på tiltale og rettssak, men eventuelle øyenvitner kan kan ha blitt påvirket siden bildet hennes har vært mye i offentligheten. Dette er vanlig andre steder i Storbritannia, men skotsk lov fungerer annerledes, slik at domstoler vurderer publisering av bilder som potensielt til skade for offeret. Professor Pamela Ferguson på Universitetet i Dundee notater «journalister ser ut til å henge i en tynn tråd dersom de publiserer bilder osv. av mistenkte». Journalister har blitt opplyst av Crown Office, som har overordnet ansvar for påtalemyndighet, at ingen ytterligere kommentarer vil bli lagt frem før tiltale.
mt: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh's court charged with killing her son. She is remanded in custody and awaits charge and trial, but potential witnesses may have been affected since her picture has been much in the public eye. This is common elsewhere in the United Kingdom, but Scottish law works differently, so courts consider publishing pictures as potentially harmful to the victim. Professor Pamela Ferguson at the University of Dundee notes "journalists seem to be hanging by a thin thread if they publish pictures etc. of suspects". Journalists have been informed by the Crown Office, which has overall responsibility for prosecution, that no further comments will be made until charge.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: I tillegg til knusende is, har ekstreme værforhold vært en hindring i redningsaksjonen. Pittmann antydet at forholdene ikke vil forbedres før neste uke. Ifølge Pittman er mengden og tykkelsen på pakk-isen det verste det har vært for seljegere i løpet av de siste 15 årene.
mt: In addition to crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been a hindrance in the rescue operation. Pittmann indicated that conditions will not improve until next week. According to Pittman, the amount and thickness of the pack ice is the worst it has been for sealers in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts nektet rett ut å uttale seg om når han tror livet begynner, noe som er et viktig spørsmål med hensyn til etikken rundt abort, og han sier at det ville ikke være etisk riktig å kommentere detaljer i slike tilfeller. Han forandret derimot sin forrige mening om at Roe v. Wade var den «endelige loven for landet», og presiserte hvor viktig det er med konsekvente dommer fra høyesterett. Han bekreftet også at han trodde på den impliserte retten til personvern som Roe-vedtaket var tuftet på.
mt: Roberts refused to state when he believes life begins, which is an important question with regards to ethics around abortion, and he said it would not be ethically correct to comment on details in such cases. He changed his previous opinion that Roe v. Wade was the "final law of the land", and clarified how important it is with consistent rulings from the Supreme Court. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy that Roe v. Wade was based on.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Klokken 08:46 på sekundet, det eksakte øyeblikket som det første flyet traff målet sitt, falt en stillhet over byen. To lysstråler har blitt rigget opp til å peke mot himmelen om natten. Det bygges nå 5 nye skyskrapere på plassen, med et senter for transport og en minnepark i midten.
mt: 8:46 am on the second, the exact moment the first plane hit its target, fell a silence over the city. Two light beams have been rigged up to point to the sky at night. There are now 5 new skyscrapers being built on the site, with a transportation center and a memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Alle grotteinngangene, som ble gitt navnet «The Seven Sisters», er i hvert fall 100–250 m (328–820 britiske fot) i diameter. Infrarøde bilder viser temperaturvariasjonene fra natt og dag som antyder at det sannsynligvis befinner seg huler der. De er kaldere enn den overflaten som ligger rundt i løpet av dagen og varmere på natten. Deres termisk oppførsel er ikke så stabile som store grotter på Jorden som ofte vedlikeholdes av en ganske konstant temperatur, men er derimot i samsvar med disse å være dype hull i bakken», sa Glen Cushing fra USAs Geologiske institutt (USGS) Astrogeology Team og Nord-Arizona-universitetet lokalisert i Flagstaff, Arizona.
mt: All the cave entrances, which were given the name "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100–250 m (328–820 British feet) in diameter. Infrared images show temperature variations from night and day that suggest that there may be caves there. They are cooler than the surface that surrounds them during the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as stable as large caves on Earth that are often maintained by a fairly constant temperature, but are instead in agreement with these being deep holes in the ground, "said Glen Cushing from the US Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and the Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Mannen hadde med seg sprengstoff og skal ha kjørt inn i en folkemengde med en trehjuling. Mannen som mistenkt for å detonere bomben ble varetektsfengslet, etter å ha pådratt seg skader fra eksplosjonen. Navnet hans er fortsatt ikke kjent for myndighetene, men de vet at han er medlem av den etniske gruppen Uighur.
mt: A man was carrying explosives and drove a tricycle into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was arrested, after suffering injuries from the explosion. His name is still unknown to authorities, but they know he is a member of the ethnic group Uighur.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Sør-Afrika har slått All Blacks (New Zealand) i en rugbyforening Tri-Nations-kamp på Royal Bafokeng-stadion i Rustenburg, Sør-Afrika. Det endelige resultatet ble 21–20, de vant med ett poeng og avsluttet dermed All Blacks sin seiersrekke på 15 seire i ett strekk. For Springboks endte det med en rekke tap i femkamp. All Blacks hadde allerede vunnet troféen for to uker siden, og dette var deres siste kamp. Den siste kampen i serien vil foregå i Ellis-parken i Johannesburg neste uke, og da spiller Springemen mot Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri-Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was 21–20, they won by one point and ended All Blacks' winning streak of 15 wins in a row. For Springboks it ended with a streak of losses in five matches. All Blacks had already won the trophy two weeks ago, and this was their last match. The last match in the series will take place in Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, and then Springboks will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stasjonen sto ved denne holdningen frem til romvandringen var over, til tross for tapet av et gyroskop tidligere i romstasjonoppdraget. Chiao og Sharipov rapporterte at de var i trygg avstand fra thrusterne for holdningskontroll. Russisk bakkestyring aktiverte jetflyene og den vanlige holdningen til stasjonen ble gjenvunnet.
mt: The station was in this attitude until the spacewalk was over, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were in a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jet engines and the station's normal attitude was regained.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Saken ble straffeforfulgt i Virginia fordi det er hjemmet til den ledende Internett-tjenesteleverandøren AOL, selskapet som innførte tiltalen. Dette er første gang en dom er avsagt etter lovgivningen vedtatt i 2003 for å demme opp for masse-e-poster, også kjent som søppelpost, som har blitt sendt uoppfordret til brukernes innboks.
mt: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home of leading Internet service provider AOL, the company that brought the suit. This is the first time a verdict has been rendered under legislation passed in 2003 to curb unsolicited bulk e-mail, also known as spam, sent to users' inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28 år gammel hadde Vidal gått fra Sevilla til Barçelona for tre sesonger siden. Vidal har deltatt i 49 kamper for sportsklubben etter han flyttet til den katalanske hovedstaden.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal had gone from Sevilla to Barcelona for three seasons since. Vidal has participated in 49 games for the sports club after he moved to the Catalan capital.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Under førsesongtreningen på Coverciano i Italia, øvde Jarque tidligere i dag. Han overnattet på lagets hotell før den planlagte kampen mot Bolonia på søndagen. Han oppholdt seg på laghotellet foran en kamp mot Bologna, som var planlagt søndag.
mt: Jarque trained earlier today at Coverciano in Italy. He spent the night at the team hotel before the planned match against Bologna on Sunday. He stayed at the team hotel before a match against Bologna, which was scheduled for Sunday.

src: Ingen tsunami-varsel er gitt, og ifølge Jakartas byrå for geofysikk, vil ingen tsunami-varsel bli utstedt fordi skjelvet ikke oppfylte kravet på 6,5 i styrke. Beboere begynte å få panikk og forlot sine bedrifter og hjem, til tross for at det ikke er noen tsunami-trussel.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued, and according to Jakarta's geophysics office, no tsunami warning will be issued because the earthquake did not meet the requirement of 6.5 in strength. Residents began to panic and left their businesses and homes, despite there being no tsunami threat.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: De fant ut at solen fungerte på de samme grunnprinsippene som andre stjerner: Aktiviteten til alle stjerner i systemet viste seg å kun være drevet av sin lysstyrke og rotasjon. Lysstyrken og rotasjonen brukes sammen for å fastslå en stjernes Rossbytall som er knyttet til væskestrøm. Desto lavere Rossbytallet er, desto mindre aktiv er stjernen når det gjelder magnetiske reverseringer.
mt: They found that the sun worked on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven only by their luminosity and rotation. Luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to the fluid flow. The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Av 1400 personer som stemte før det føderale valget i 2010, økte antallet som motsetter seg at Australia skal bli en republikk, med 8 prosent siden 2008. Den midlertidige statsministeren Julia Gillard hevdet i kampanjen ved det føderale valget i 2010 at Australia skulle bli en republikk på slutten av dronning Elizabeth II sin regjeringstid. 34 prosent i meningsmålingen deler dette synspunkt, og ønsker dronning Elizabeth II som Australias siste monark. Ved ytterlighetene i meningsmålingen synes 29 % at Australia burde bli en republikk fortest mulig, mens 31 % synes Australia aldri bør bli en republikk.
mt: 1400 people who voted in the federal election in 2010, increased the number who oppose Australia becoming a republic by 8 percent since 2008. The interim Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed in the campaign at the federal election in 2010 that Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent in the poll share this view, and want Queen Elizabeth II as Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll seems 29 % that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 % think Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Talsperson for Komen-stiftelsen, Leslie Aun, sa at organisasjonen har tatt i bruk en ny regel som ikke tillater at bidrag eller finansiering blir delt ut til organisasjoner som er under juridisk etterforskning. Komens politikk diskvalifiserte Planned Parenthood (Planlagt foreldre ) grunnet en gransking om hvordan Planned Parenthood benytter og registrerer penger som gjennomføres av Representant Cliff Stearns. I sin rolle som styreformann for underkomiteen til Oversight and Investigations (tilsyn og undersøkelser) som er underordnet House Energy and Commerse-komiteen (energi og handel), undersøker Stearn om skatter har blitt brukt til å støtte aborter gjennom Planned Parenthood.
mt: Leslie Aun, spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization has adopted a new rule that does not allow contributions or funding to be distributed to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood (Planned Parenthood) due to an investigation into how Planned Parenthood uses and records money through Representative Cliff Stearns. In his role as chairman of the subcommittee of Oversight and Investigations (oversight and investigations) under the House Energy and Commerce Committee (energy and commerce), Stearns is investigating whether taxes have been used to support abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Madhya Pradesh-politiet hentet den stjelte bærbare PC-en og mobilen. Stedfortredende generalinspektør D K Arya sa: «Vi har pågrepet fem personer som voldtok den sveitsiske kvinnen og funnet mobilen og den bærbare datamaskinen hennes». Siktede er navngitt som Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar og Vishnu Kanjar. Siktede dukket opp i retten med tildekkede ansikter, sa politioverbetjent Chandra Shekhar Solanki.
mt: Madhya Pradesh police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said: "We have arrested five people who raped the Swiss woman and found her mobile phone and laptop." The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. The accused appeared in court with covered faces, said police officer Chandra Shekhar Solanki.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee-PC, som tidligere har blitt lansert over hele verden for sine kostnadseffektive og funksjonalistiske egenskaper, ble et hett tema under IT-måneden i Taipei 2007. Derimot vil forbrukermarkedet på bærbare PC-er være radikalt variert og forandret etter at ASUS ble tildelt Taiwan Sustainable Award av administrerende Yuan i Kina 2007.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, which has been released worldwide for its cost-effective and functional features, was a hot topic at the IT month in Taipei 2007. However, the consumer market for portable PCs will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded the Taiwan Sustainable Award by the Executive Yuan in China 2007.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
