src: Problemet startet den 1. januar da titalls lokale beboere begynte å klage til postkontoret i Obanazawa om at de ikke hadde fått sine tradisjonelle nyttårskort som vanlig. Postkontoret kom i går med en beklagelse til borgere og media etter å ha funnet ut at gutten hadde skjult mer enn 600 postdokumenter, blant annet 429 nyttårskort, som ikke nådde frem til de rette mottakerne.
mt: The problem started on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining to the post office in Obanazawa that they had not received their traditional New Year's cards as usual. The post office issued an apology to residents and the media yesterday after finding out that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, that did not reach the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Problemet startet den 1. januar da titalls lokale beboere begynte å klage til postkontoret i Obanazawa om at de ikke hadde fått sine tradisjonelle nyttårskort som vanlig. Postkontoret kom i går med en beklagelse til borgere og media etter å ha funnet ut at gutten hadde skjult mer enn 600 postdokumenter, blant annet 429 nyttårskort, som ikke nådde frem til de rette mottakerne.
mt: The problem started on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining to the post office in Obanazawa that they had not received their traditional New Year's cards as usual. The post office issued an apology to residents and the media yesterday after finding out that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, that did not reach the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray tapte det første settet i en tiebreak etter at begge mennene klarte å holde sine server i settet. Del Potro hadde den tidlige fordelen i det andre settet, men også dette ble til uavgjort etter at resultatet ble 6-6. Potro fikk behandling til skulderen på denne tiden, men klarte å komme tilbake til spillet.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreak after both men held their serves in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but also this was tied after the score was 6-6. Potro received treatment for his shoulder at this time, but managed to come back to the game.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: Akkompagnert av disse tjenestemennene, hevdet han ovenfor Texas-borgere at tiltak har blitt gjennomført for å beskytte den offentlige sikkerheten. Perry uttalte spesifikt, «Det er få steder i verden som er bedre i stand til å møte utfordringen man blir stilt overfor i dette tilfellet». Guvernøren uttalte også: «Vi har i dag fått vite at det har blitt identifisert noen barn i skolealder som har vært i kontakt med pasienten». Han fortsatte med å si: «Dette er seriøst. Vær sikker på at systemet vårt opererer så godt som det skal».
mt: Accompanied by these public servants, he told Texas citizens that measures have been taken to protect public safety. Perry specifically stated, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge presented in this case." The governor also stated, "We have learned today that some children in school age have been in contact with the patient." He continued by saying, "This is serious. Be sure that our system is operating as well as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Heck og Johnson visualiserte en publikasjon som skulle gjøre narr av nyhetene – og nyhetsrapporteringer – da de var elever ved UW i 1988, lang tid før The Daily Show og The Colbert Report. Siden oppstarten har The Onion blitt et veritabelt imperium for nyhetsparodi, med en papirutgave, en nettside som trakk 5 000 000 unike besøkende i oktober måned, personlige annonser, et 24 timers nyhetsnettverk, podkaster og et nylig lansert verdensatlas som heter Our Dumb World. Al Gore og general Tommy Franker deler seg sine favorittnyheter uformelt (Nyheten om Gore ble skrevet da The Onion meldte at han og Tipper hadde sine livs beste sex etter hans Electoral College-nederlag i år 2000). Mange av deres forfattere har fortsatt å ha stor innflytelse på nyhetsparodi-programmene til Jon Stewart og Stephen Colberts.
mt: Heck and Johnson visualized a publication that would make fun of the news – and news reporting – when they were students at UW in 1988, long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report. Since its start, The Onion has become a veritable empire for news parody, with a print edition, a website that drew 5 million unique visitors in October, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franker share their favorite news stories informally (The Gore story was written when The Onion reported that he and Tipper had the best sex of their lives after his Electoral College defeat in 2000). Many of their writers have continued to have a large influence on the news parody programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Protesten startet rundt 11:00 lokal tid (UTC +1) på Whitehall på motsatt side av den politivoktede inngangen til Downing Street, forteller statsministerens offisielle residens. Demonstranter sperret like etter klokken 11:00 trafikken i nordgående retning i Whitehall. 11.20 ba politiet demonstrantene flytte seg bakover til fortauet, med beskjed om at de måtte balansere retten til å protestere med trafikken som tok seg opp. I halv tolv-tiden på dagen beveget demonstrasjonen seg oppover ved Whitehall, forbi Trafalgar Square, ved Strand, forbi Aldwych og oppover Kingsway mot Holborn hvor det konservative partiet arrangerte vårforum på hotellet Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: 11:00 am local time (UTC +1) on Whitehall, opposite the police cordoned entrance to Downing Street, the official residence of the prime minister. Demonstrators immediately blocked traffic in the northbound direction in Whitehall. At 11:20, police asked the demonstrators to move back to the pavement, with a warning that they had to balance the right to protest with traffic. By half past twelve, the demonstration moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along Strand, past Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party was holding its spring forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: «Vi har nå 4 måneder gamle mus som har blitt kvitt son diabetes», la han til. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor i medisin ved Dalhousie-universitet i Halifax, Nova Scotia og sjef ved den kliniske og vitenskapelige divisjonen av den kanadiske diabetesforeningen, advarte om at det er fortsatt foretatt lite forskning. Han er, i likhet med andre eksperter, skeptisk til om diabetes kan kureres og påpeker at disse funnene ikke er relevant for mennesker som allerede har type 1 diabetes.
mt: 4-month-old mice have been cured of diabetes, he said. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that little research has been done. He, like other experts, is skeptical that diabetes can be cured and points out that these findings are not relevant to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otteren forsøkte en landing på Kokoda i går, som Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, men da hadde landingen allerede blitt avbrutt en gang. Ca. ti minutter før det skulle lande etter sin andre innflyvning, forsvant det. Vrakstedet ble lokalisert i dag og er så utilgjengelig at to politimenn har blitt sluppet ned over jungelen for å ta seg fram til åstedet og lete etter overlevende. Søket måtte stoppes på grunn av det samme problematiske været som hadde ført til den avbrutte landingen.
mt: The Twin Otter attempted a landing at Kokoda yesterday, as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but the landing had already been aborted once. About ten minutes before it was due to land after its second approach, it disappeared. The wreckage was located today and is so inaccessible that two police officers have been dropped over the jungle to make their way to the crash site and search for survivors. The search had to be stopped due to the same problematic weather that had led to the aborted landing.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: Jeg så en makaber scene der folk forsøkte å knuse vinduer for å komme seg ut, men heldigvis skjedde det ikke noe med meg. Folk slo i rutene med stoler, men det var umulig å knuse vinduene. «En av rutene røk til slutt, og de kom seg ut av vinduet», sa overlevende Franciszek Kowal.
mt: I saw a macabre scene where people tried to break windows to get out, but fortunately nothing happened to me. People were hitting the windows with chairs, but it was impossible to break the windows. "One of the windows smoked and they got out through the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Den tropiske stormen Danielle er den fjerde navngitte stormen av orkansesongen i Atlanterhavet 2010, og oppsto i det østlige Atlanterhavet. Stormen, som fant sted rundt 3 000 kilometer fra Miami i Florida, har maksimal vedvarende vindkast på 40 amerikanske mil i timen (64 km/t). Forskere fra det nasjonale orkansenteret forventer at Danielle vil forsterkes til en orkan før onsdag. Siden stormen er langt fra land, blir det ofte vanskelig å vurdere potensielle effekt på USA eller Karibia.
mt: Danielle is the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, and formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, which occurred about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has a maximum sustained wind speed of 40 mph (64 km/h). Researchers at the National Hurricane Center expect Danielle to strengthen into a hurricane by Wednesday. Since the storm is far from land, it is often difficult to assess potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Rapporter om at barn i Tyrkia skal ha blitt smittet med fugleinfluensaviruset A (H5N1) uten å bli syke gjorde at Dr. Lee ga uttrykk for sin bekymring. Det finnes undersøkelser som viser at sykdommen må være mindre dødelig før den kan føre til en global epidemi, forklarte han. Man er bekymret for at pasienter kan fortsette å smitte flere personer i løpet av sine daglige rutiner dersom influensasymptomene holder seg milde.
mt: Reports that children in Turkey have been infected with the avian influenza virus A (H5N1) without becoming ill caused Dr. Lee to express his concern. There are studies that show the disease must be less deadly before it can lead to a global epidemic, he explained. We are concerned that patients can continue to infect more people during their daily routines if the influenza symptoms remain mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Fra og med natten til 9. august var øyet til Morakot ca. 70 km borte fra den kinesiske provinsen Fujian. Tyfonen er estimert til å bevege seg mot Kina på 11 kilometer i timen.
mt: 9 August, the eye of Morakot was about 70 km away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to move towards China at 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: USAs president George W. Bush kom til Singapore om morgenen den 16. november som innledningen til en ukes rundtur i Asia. Han ble tatt i mot av visestatsministeren i Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, og har diskutert handels- og terrorsaker med statsministeren i Singapore, Lee Heggen Loong. Etter en uke med tap i midterm-valget, fortalte Bush et publikum om utbyggelsen av handel i Asia.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning as the start of a week's tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terror issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm elections, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Dagens annonsering forlenget også regjeringens engasjement laget i mars i år for å finansiere ekstra vogner. Ytterligere 300 bringer totalen til 1300 vogner som skal hentes for å begrense overbefolkning.
mt: The announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March to finance extra wagons. Another 300 brings the total to 1300 wagons to be collected to limit overpopulation.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Hun sa: «Det er ingen kunnskap om et nært forestående angrep. Den samlede trusselen har ikke forsvunnet, selv om trusselnivået er redusert til alvorlig».
mt: She said: "There is no specific intelligence of an imminent attack. The overall threat has not gone away, even though the threat level is reduced to severe."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly sverget inn et nytt valgråd (CEP) på 9 medlemmer i går. Det er faktisk Martelly sin femte CEP på fire år. En presidentkommisjon anbefalte forrige måned den tidligere CEP-oppsigelsen (Haitis valgkommisjon) som en del av en pakke med tiltak for å drive landet mot nye valg. Kommisjonen var en respons fra Martelly på utbredte demonstrasjoner mot regimet, som begynte i oktober. De noen ganger voldelige demonstrasjonene oppsto grunnet manglende avholdte valg, noen med forfall siden 2011.
mt: 9 members were sworn in yesterday. It is actually Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. A presidential commission recommended the former CEP resignation (Haiti's electoral commission) last month as part of a package of measures to drive the country towards new elections. The commission was a response from Martelly to widespread demonstrations against the regime, which began in October. The sometimes violent demonstrations arose due to lack of held elections, some of which have lapsed since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: Martelly sverget inn et nytt valgråd (CEP) på 9 medlemmer i går. Det er faktisk Martelly sin femte CEP på fire år. En presidentkommisjon anbefalte forrige måned den tidligere CEP-oppsigelsen (Haitis valgkommisjon) som en del av en pakke med tiltak for å drive landet mot nye valg. Kommisjonen var en respons fra Martelly på utbredte demonstrasjoner mot regimet, som begynte i oktober. De noen ganger voldelige demonstrasjonene oppsto grunnet manglende avholdte valg, noen med forfall siden 2011.
mt: 9 members were sworn in yesterday. It is actually Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. A presidential commission recommended the former CEP resignation (Haiti's electoral commission) last month as part of a package of measures to drive the country towards new elections. The commission was a response from Martelly to widespread demonstrations against the regime, which began in October. The sometimes violent demonstrations arose due to lack of held elections, some of which have lapsed since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics støtter brevet fra den amerikanske OL-komiteen og er enige i at det er sårt nødvendig for OL-familien å kunne fremme et trygt miljø for alle utøverne sine. Vi er enige i USHs uttalelse om at interessene til våre utøvere og klubber og sporten deres, kan bli bedre tjent med å bevege seg fremover med en meningsfull endring innenfor vår organisasjon, i stedet for ny sertifisering. USA Gymnastics støtter en uavhengig gransking som kan sette lys på hvordan misbruk av proporsjoner som beskrives så tappert av at de overlevende etter Larry Nassar kunne ha gått uoppdaget i så lang tid og omfavner eventuelle nødvendige og aktuelle endringer. USA Gymnastics og USOC har samme mål — det å gjøre idrett og annen sport så trygt som mulig for utøvere, slik at de kan følge drømmene sine i et miljø som er trygt, sterkt og positivt.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the USOC and agrees that it is so important for the Olympic family to be able to promote a safe environment for all its athletes. We agree with USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs and the sport itself can be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than recertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent review that can shed light on how abuse of proportions described so painfully by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal — to make sport and other sports as safe as possible for athletes, so they can pursue their dreams in a safe, strong and positive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Ifølge den amerikanske marinen så etterforsket de også hendelsen. I en uttalelse sa de også: «Mannskapet jobber for tiden med å avgjøre hvordan skipet best kan hentes ut, på en trygg måte». Det var et minemottiltaksskip av Avenger-klassen og var på vei til Puerto Princesa i Palawan. Den er tildelt den amerikanske marinens sjuende flåte, og er basert i Sasebo, Nagasaki i Japan.
mt: According to the U.S. Navy, they were also investigating the incident. In a statement they also said: "The crew is currently working to determine the best way to safely recover the ship." It was a mine countermeasure ship of the Avenger-class and was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy, and is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Sent på søndag meddelte USAs president Donald Trump, i en uttalelse levert via hans pressesekretær, at de amerikanske troppene nå skulle forlate Syria. Meddelelsen kom etter at Trump hadde hatt en telefonsamtale med den tyrkiske presidenten Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Tyrkia ville også ta over bevoktningen av fangede IS-krigere som, ifølge uttalelsen, europeiske nasjoner har nektet å ta tilbake.
mt: On Sunday, US President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered through his press secretary, announced that American troops would now leave Syria. The statement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over the protection of captured IS fighters, who, according to the statement, European nations have refused to take back.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koalisjonen flyttet inn i området sammen med afghanske tropper, for å sikre stedet. Andre koalisjonsfly er sendt for å bistå. Krasjet skjedde høyt oppe i ulent terreng og antas å ha skjedd på grunn av fiendtlige skudd. Innsatsen for å søke etter styrtstedet blir møtt av dårlig vær og tøft terreng.
mt: The coalition moved into the area with Afghan troops, to secure the area. Other coalition aircraft were sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in rugged terrain and is believed to have occurred due to hostile fire. The search for the crash site is hampered by bad weather and rugged terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Da demningen ble bygget i 1963 ble det satt stopper for den sesongmessige flommen som spredte sedimentering nedover elven. Dette sedimentet var nødvendig for å lage sandbanker og strender, som tjente som habitater for dyreliv. Dermed har to fiskearter blitt utryddet, mens to andre har fått status som utrydningstruet, inkludert fisken Gila cypha. Nivået med vann kommer kun til å stige noen meter etter flommen, men tjenestemenn håper allikevel at det er nok til å gjenopprette eroderte sandbanker nedstrøms.
mt: When the dam was built in 1963, it stopped the seasonal flood that spread sediment downstream. This sediment was necessary to create sandbars and beaches, which served as habitats for wildlife. As a result, two fish species have been extirpated, while two others have been listed as endangered, including the fish Gila cypha. The water level will only rise a few meters after the flood, but officials hope it is enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: USAs ambassade lokalisert i Nairobi i Kenya har utstedt en advarsel om at «ekstremister fra Somalia» har planer om å utføre flere selvmordsbombeangrep i Kenya og Etiopia. USA hevder de har mottatt anonym informasjon som spesifikt forteller at man planlegger bruk av selvmordsbombere til å sprenge «prominente landemerker» i Etiopia og Kenya.
mt: The US embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" have plans to carry out more suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The US claims it has received anonymous information that specifically states that they plan to use suicide bombers to blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: De berømte greske juristene, Sakis Kechagiou og George Nikolakopoulos, har sittet fengslet i Athen-fengselet i Korydalus, fordi de ble funnet skyldig i graft og korrupsjon. På grunn av dette har en stor skandale i det greske lovsamfunnet kommet til overflaten etter eksponeringen av forbudte handlinger som dommere, advokater og jurister har foretatt gjennom de tidligere årene. For noen uker siden, etter at informasjonen som ble publisert av journalisten Makis Triantafylopoilos i sin populære TV-serie «Zoungla» i Alpha TV, ble medlem av parlamentet og advokat, Petros Mantouvalos abdisert som medlemmer, siden hans kontor hadde vært involvert i ulovlig graft og korrupsjon. Toppdommer Evangelos Kalousis ble deretter arrestert da han var skyldig i korrupsjon og degenerert oppførsel.
mt: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagiou and George Nikolakopoulos, have been sitting in the Athens prison in Korydalos, because they were found guilty of graft and corruption. Because of this, a big scandal in the Greek legal system has come to the surface after the exposure of forbidden actions that judges, lawyers and jurists have performed through the past years. For some weeks ago, after the information that was published by journalist Makis Triantafylopoilos in his popular TV series «Zoungla» in Alpha TV, member of parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos abdicated as a member, since his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Top judge Evangelos Kalousis was then arrested because he was guilty of corruption and degenerated behavior.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa fikk omgangens høyeste poengsum, 70 poeng på bare 41 slag. Han fikk elleve ganger fire poeng , og to ganger seks poeng. Mellomordens flaggermus, Sachin Tendulkar og Rahul Dravid, gjennomførte godt og inngikk et partnerskap på hundre løp. Etter å ha mistet kapteinens wicket klarte India bare 36 løp og tapte 7 wicketer på slutten av omgangene.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of the innings, 70 runs in 41 balls. He scored eleven fours and two sixes. The nightwatchman, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, played well and put up a partnership of 100 runs. After losing the captain's wicket, India could only score 36 runs and lost seven wickets at the end of the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Commons-administrator Adam Cuerden var irritabel på grunn av slettingene når han pratet med Wikinews for en måned siden. «Han [Wales] var i utgangspunktet uærlig med oss fra begynnelsen. Først i atferden sin, som om dette var av juridiske årsaker. For det andre, ved å gi inntrykk av at han hørte på oss, rett opp til slettingen av kunsten sin.» Irritasjon fra allmennheten førte til gjeldende innsats med å utarbeide en nettsidepolicy med hensyn til seksuelt innhold. Nettstedet er vert for millioner av åpent-lisensierte medier.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden was irritated by the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews a month ago. "He [Wales] was initially dishonest with us from the beginning. First in his behavior, as if this was for legal reasons. Secondly, by giving the impression that he was listening to us, right up to the deletion of his own art." Irritation from the public led to the current effort to draft a website policy regarding sexual content. The site hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Ikke alle var like støttende til inkluderingen av kvinner. 2004 OL-sølv-medaljevinner Amir Khan sa: «Innerst inne mener jeg at kvinner ikke bør slåss. Det er min mening». Han sa til tross for kommentarene sine at han skal støtte de britiske konkurrentene i 2012-OL som avholdes i London.
mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan was not as supportive of the inclusion of women. He said, "Deep down, I think women shouldn't fight. That's my opinion." He said despite his comments that he will support the British competitors in the 2012 Olympics, which will be held in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: En 13 år gammel motorsykkelracer, Peter Lenz, mistet livet etter å ha vært involvert i en kollisjon på Indianapolis Motor Speedway. På oppvarmingsrunden falt Lenz av sykkelen, og ble deretter truffet av syklisten Xavier Zayat. Han ble umiddelbart tatt vare på av den medisinske staben på stedet, og transportert til et lokalt sykehus hvor han senere døde. Zayat ble ikke skadet i ulykken.
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died after being involved in a collision at Indianapolis Motor Speedway. During the warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then hit by rider Xavier Zayat. He was immediately taken care of by the medical staff on site, and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Det å reise med fly kan være en skremmende opplevelse for folk i alle aldre og med all slags bakgrunn, særlig om de ikke har fløyet før eller dersom de har opplevd en traumatisk hendelse. Det er ingenting å skamme seg over, det er ikke noe annerledes enn andre ting som veldig mange frykter eller misliker. Det å få forståelse for hvordan flyet virker og hva som oppstår ved flyvning, kan for noen hjelpe for å komme over en redsel basert på det ukjente eller på ikke å ha kontroll.
mt: Traveling by plane can be a frightening experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if they have not flown before or if they have experienced a traumatic event. There is nothing to be ashamed of, it is no different than other things that many fear or dislike. Understanding how the plane works and what happens during flight can help some overcome a fear based on the unknown or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Nå for tiden bestilles flyreiser sjelden gjennom flyselskapet uten å først søke og sammenligne kostnader. Noen ganger kan den samme flyvningen ha ganske varierende priser på ulike aggregatorer og det kan være lurt å sammenligne søkeresultater i tillegg til å sjekke nettstedet til selve flyselskapet før booking.
mt: Today, few people book flights through an airline without first searching and comparing costs. Sometimes the same flight can have quite varying prices on different aggregators and it can be worth comparing search results in addition to checking the website of the airline itself before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Fraktselskaper får mye penger for å levere ting raskt. Ofte er tiden svært betydningsfull når det kommer til forretningsdokumenter, varer eller reservedeler for en hastereparasjon. På enkelte ruter benytter de større bedriftene egne fly, men for mindre bedrifter var det problematisk. Om de sendte ting med luftfrakt, det kan ha tatt dager på noen ruter å komme gjennom utlasting og tollvesenet. Den eneste måten å få det raskere gjennom på, var å sende det som innsjekket bagasje. Flyselskapsreguleringer lar dem ikke sende bagasje uten passasjer, og det er her du kommer inn i bildet.
mt: Freight companies make a lot of money by delivering things quickly. Often, time is very important when it comes to business documents, goods or spare parts for a quick repair. Some larger companies use their own planes, but for smaller companies it was problematic. If they sent things by air freight, it could take days on some routes to go through customs and customs. The only way to get it faster through was to send it as checked baggage. Airlines regulations allow them not to send baggage without a passenger, and that's where you come into the picture.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Du bør være nøye når du velger dine Frequent Flyer- flyselskap i en allianse. Selv om du kanskje tror det er best å reise med det flyselskapet du flyr mest med, bør du være klar over at de fordelene som tilbys ofte varierer, og poeng for de som flyr ofte kan være mer sjenerøse hos et annet flyselskap i samme allianse.
mt: You should be careful when choosing your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance. While you may think it is best to fly with the airline you fly most with, you should be aware that the benefits offered often vary, and points for frequent flyers can be more generous with another airline in the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Drikker med alkohol bør drikkes med fornuft. Alkohol virker inn på alle på ulike måter. Det å kjenne grensene dine, er svært viktig. Mulige langsiktige helsehendelser fra alkoholmisbruk kan innebære leverskader og til og med blindhet og død. Potensiell fare økes dersom det inntas alkohol som er ulovlig produsert. Ulovlig alkohol kan ha innhold av ulike skadelige urenheter som metanol, som kan forårsake blindhet eller død, selv i små mengder.
mt: Drinking alcohol should be done with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently. Knowing your limits is very important. Possible long-term health effects from alcohol abuse can include liver damage and even blindness and death. Potential danger increases if alcohol is taken that is illegally produced. Illegally produced alcohol can contain various harmful impurities such as methanol, which can cause blindness or death, even in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Kanaldistriktet er det kjente 1600-tallsdistriktet som omkranser Binnenstad Amsterdam. På grunn av den unike kulturelle og historiske verdien er hele området oppført på UNESCOs verdensarvliste, eiendomsverdiene der er også blant de høyeste i landet.
mt: 17th-century district that surrounds the city center. Due to the unique cultural and historical value, the entire area is listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List, and property values there are also among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 kilometer sørvest for Siem Reap. Dette bakketopp-tempelet ble opprettet i slutten av det 9. århundre under regimet til kong Yasovarman. Den mystiske atmosfæren i tempelet og utsikten over Tonle Sap-vannet gjør klatringen opp til berget verdt det. Det kan være praktisk å kombinere besøket med en båttur til sjøen. Angkor-passet trengs for å gå inn i templet så ikke glem å ta med deg passet ditt når du skal til Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 kilometers southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century under the reign of King Yasovarman. The mysterious atmosphere in the temple and the view over Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the top worth it. It may be practical to combine the visit with a boat tour to the lake. The Angkor pass is required to enter the temple so don't forget to bring your pass when you go to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktis er området som ligger rundt sydpolen og er det aller kaldeste området på jorden. Turistbesøk koster mye penger, krever god fysisk form, kan kun skje i løpet av sommeren fra november til februar og er stort sett begrenset til halvøya, øyene og Rosshavet. Et par tusen ansatte bor her om sommeren i flere forskjellige baser hovedsakelig i områdene; noen få oppholder seg der over vinteren. Antarktis er et øde platå som er dekket med to til tre kilometer med is. Det foretas av og til flyvninger innenlands som er spesifikke for fjellklatring, eller for å nå polen, som har en stor base.
mt: Antarctica is the area around the South Pole and is the coldest area on Earth. Tourist visits are expensive, require good physical condition, can only be made during the summer from November to February and are mostly limited to the peninsula, islands and Ross Sea. A few thousand employees live there during the summer in several different bases mainly in the areas; a few stay there over the winter. Antarctica is a barren plateau covered with two to three kilometers of ice. Flights are occasionally made within the country which are specific for mountain climbing, or to reach the pole, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Førmoderne observatorier er som regel litt foreldet i vår tid og blir gjerne benyttet til museer eller utdanningssteder. Ettersom lysforurensning ikke var den type problem i deres glansdager som det er i dag, befinner de seg vanligvis i byer eller ved studiesteder som er lettere tilgjengelige enn de som er bygget i moderne tid. De fleste moderne forskningsteleskop er enorme anlegg i eksterne områder med gunstige atmosfæreforhold.
mt: Pre-modern observatories are usually a little outdated in our time and are often used as museums or educational facilities. Since light pollution was not the type of problem in their heyday as it is today, they are usually located in cities or near educational facilities that are easier to access than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Grunnet Aucklands 2 havner er det flere strender. De mest populære er på 3 steder. North Shore-strendene i North-Harbor-distriktet ligger i Stillehavet. Strendene der strekker seg helt fra Long Bay i nord – til Devonsport i sør. Nesten alle strendene er trygg for å svømme, og de fleste har skygge fra pohutukawa-trær. Tamaki Drive-strender er på Waitemata Harbour, i oppmarkedforstedene til Mission Bay og St. Heliers i Sentral-Auckland. Noen ganger finner man overfylte familiestrender med et godt utvalg av butikker langs kysten. Det er trygt å svømme.
mt: 2 harbours in Auckland means more beaches. The most popular are on 3 places. North Shore beaches in North Harbour district are in the Pacific Ocean. The beaches stretch all the way from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Almost all beaches are safe for swimming, and most have shade from pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on Waitemata Harbour, in the suburbs of Mission Bay and St. Heliers in Central Auckland. Sometimes you find crowded family beaches with a good selection of shops along the coast. It is safe to swim.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Husk at du faktisk besøker et massegravsted, i tillegg til et sted som har en nesten umåtelig betydning for en stor del av verdens befolkning. Det er fortsatt mange menn og kvinner i live i dag som overlevde sin tid her, og mange flere som elsket dem som ble drept eller jobbet til døden der, både jøder og andre. Vær så snill å behandle plassen med den verdigheten, høytideligheten og respekten som den fortjener. Ikke fortell vitser om holocaust eller nazister. Vennligst ikke gjør skade på området ved å merke eller risse graffiti inn i strukturer.
mt: Remember that you are actually visiting a mass grave, in addition to a place that has an almost immeasurable significance for a large part of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive today who survived their time here, and many more who loved those who were killed or worked to death there, both Jews and others. Please treat the place with the dignity, solemnity, and respect that it deserves. Do not tell jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Please do not damage the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Hjelpespråk er kunstige eller konstruerte språk som er opprettet med en intensjon om å tilrettelegge for kommunikasjon mellom mennesker som ellers ville hatt vanskeligheter med å kommunisere. De skiller seg fra lingua franca som er naturlige eller økologiske språk som blir dominerende av én eller annen grunn som en måte å kommunisere mellom talere av andre språk.
mt: Help languages are artificial or constructed languages that are created with the intention of facilitating communication between people who otherwise would have difficulty communicating. They differ from lingua francas which are natural or ecological languages that become dominant for one reason or another as a means of communicating between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Dersom du skal over Nord-Østersjøen på vinterstid bør du kontrollere hyttens beliggenhet, da det å kjøre gjennom is avgir ekstremt mye støy for de som er mest berørte. Cruise til Sankt Petersburg inkluderer tid i byen. Cruise-passasjerer er fritatt fra visumkrav (sjekk vilkårene).
mt: If you are crossing the North Sea in winter, you should check the location of the cabin, as driving through the ice gives off extremely loud noise for those most affected. Cruises to St. Petersburg include time in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check the conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Dersom du skal over Nord-Østersjøen på vinterstid bør du kontrollere hyttens beliggenhet, da det å kjøre gjennom is avgir ekstremt mye støy for de som er mest berørte. Cruise til Sankt Petersburg inkluderer tid i byen. Cruise-passasjerer er fritatt fra visumkrav (sjekk vilkårene).
mt: If you are crossing the North Sea in winter, you should check the location of the cabin, as driving through the ice gives off extremely loud noise for those most affected. Cruises to St. Petersburg include time in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check the conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Barcelonas offisielle språk er både katalansk og spansk. Rundt halvparten liker best katalansk, og de fleste har forståelse for det språket, men praktisk talt alle kan spansk. De fleste skilt er derimot bare angitt på katalansk fordi det er lovfestet som det første offisielle språket. Spansk blir i tillegg brukt i offentlig transport og andre fasiliteter likevel. Vanlige meldinger på Metro-stasjonen gjøres kun på katalansk, men uplanlagte disrupsjoner kunngjøres av et automatisert system med et bredt utvalg av språk inkludert spansk, engelsk, fransk, arabisk og japansk.
mt: Barcelona's official languages are both Catalan and Spanish. Roughly half prefer Catalan, and most have some understanding of it, but practically all can speak Spanish. Most signs are only in Catalan because it is legally mandated as the first official language. Spanish is also used in public transport and other facilities, however. Common announcements on the Metro station are only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system with a wide selection of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: I industriland anses det i dag nesten som en kunstform å tilby en luksusseng og frokost. B&B konkurrerer åpenbart hovedsakelig rundt to hovedting: seng og frokost. Følgelig kan du finne det mest luksuriøse sengetøyet i de beste av slike etablissementer, kanskje et håndlaget sengeteppe eller en antikk seng. Frokosten kan bestå av sesongbaserte delikatesser fra regionen, eller vertens signaturrett. Omgivelsene kan være en historisk foreldet bygning med antikke møbler, godt stelt tomt og svømmebasseng.
mt: In industrial countries, it is almost considered an art form to offer a luxury bed and breakfast. B&Bs are competing primarily around two main things: bed and breakfast. Therefore, you can find the most luxurious bed linen in the best of such establishments, perhaps a handmade bedspread or an antique bed. Breakfast can consist of seasonal delicacies from the region, or the host's signature right. The surroundings can be a historic old building with antique furniture, well-stocked land and swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Beijing i Kina blir vertsby i OL-vinterlekene i 2022, noe som vil gjøre det til den første byen som har vært vert for både sommer og vinter-OL. Beijing skal ha åpnings- og avslutningsseremoniene og innendørs iskonkurranser. Andre skiarrangementer vil foregå ved Taizicheng-skiplassen i Zhangjiakou, ca. 220 kilometer (140 miles) fra Beijing.
mt: Beijing, China, will be the host city for the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and indoor ice competitions. Other ski events will take place at the Taizicheng ski resort in Zhangjiakou, about 220 kilometers (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Fugleinfluensa som er formelt kjent som den aviske influensaen, kan smitte over på både fugler og pattedyr. Mindre enn 1000 tilfeller har tidligere blitt registrert blant mennesker, men noen av dem har vært dødelige. Flesteparten av tilfellene har oppstått hos personer som jobber med fjærkre, men fugletittere er heller ikke fri for risiko.
mt: Avian influenza, formally known as the avian flu, can spread to both birds and mammals. Less than 1000 cases have been recorded in humans, but some have been fatal. Most cases have occurred in people who work with poultry, but pet birds are not immune to risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikinger benyttet de russiske vannveiene til å komme seg til Svartehavet og det Kaspiske hav. Deler av disse rutene kan fremdeles benyttes. Kontroller dersom det er nødvendig med spesielle tillatelser, noe som kan være problematisk å få tak i. Kvitsjø-Østersjøkanalen knytter Nordishavet til Østersjøen via Onega-sjøen, Ladoga-sjøen og St. Petersburg, mest med elver og innsjøer. Innsjøen Onega har også forbindelse med Volga, og det er derfor fortsatt muligheter for å komme seg fra det Kaspiske havet gjennom Russland.
mt: Vikings used the Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check if special permits are required, which may be difficult to obtain. The White Sea-Baltic Canal connects the White Sea to the Baltic Sea via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and St. Petersburg, mostly with rivers and lakes. Lake Onega also has a connection to the Volga, and there are therefore still opportunities to reach the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Punktet for innvandringskontroll er som regel 1. stopp når man forlater et fly, et skip eller et annet kjøretøy. I enkelte grensekryssende tog gjøres inspeksjoner på tog i bevegelse, og du bør ha gyldig ID med deg når du går om bord på et av togene. På natt-tog kan passene samles inn av konduktøren så du slipper å vekkes opp mens du sover.
mt: 1. stop is usually the point for immigration control when leaving a plane, ship or other vehicle. In some border-crossing trains, inspections are made on moving trains, and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of the trains. On night trains, the tickets are collected by the conductor so you don't have to be woken up while sleeping.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapore er som regel en plass med høy trygghet, det er svært enkelt sted å finne frem, og du kan få tak i det meste der etter du kommer frem. Men dersom du blir plassert i «høytropene» bare noen få grader nord for ekvator trenger du å ta stilling til både varme (alltid) og sterk sol (når himmelen er klar, noe som ikke forekommer like ofte).
mt: Singapore is usually a place of high security, it is very easy to find your way around, and you can get most things there after you arrive. But if you are placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of the equator you need to take into account both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, which does not happen as often).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Tyske bakverk er meget smakfulle. I Bayern er de fyldig og variert, og kan sammenlignes med bakverket til deres sørlige nabo, Østerrike. Fruktbakst er vanlig, med innbakte epler året rundt, og kirsebær og plommer har sin entré om sommeren. Mange tyske bakverk inneholder i tillegg nøtter som mandler, hasselnøtter og andre nøtter som vokser på trær. Mange av de populære kakene smaker ekstra godt til en kopp sterk kaffe. Dersom du vil ha noen små, men fyldige bakverk, forsøk det som avhengig av område kalles for Berliner, Pfannkuchen eller Krapfen.
mt: German pastries are very tasty. In Bavaria they are rich and varied, and can be compared to the pastries of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pies are common, with baked apples year round, and cherries and plums have their entrance in the summer. Many German pastries also contain nuts such as almonds and other nuts that grow on trees. Many of the popular cakes taste extra good with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small, but rich pastries, try the ones called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen depending on the area.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Dersom du ønsker å se verden for en billig penge er det noen måter å gjøre det på, om det er av nødvendighet, en livsstil eller at du ønsker en utfordring. I bunn og grunn faller de inn i 2 kategorier: Enten kan du arbeide samtidig som du reiser, ellers så kan du forsøke å forminske utgifter. Denne artikkelen ser nærmere på sistnevnte. For de som er beredt på å gi avkall på både bekvemmelighet, tid og forutsigbarhet for å få så lave kostnader som mulig, se reiser på minimum budsjett. Det forutsetter at reisende ikke stjeler, deltar i det illegale markedet, trygler eller ellers utnytter andre for egen vinning.
mt: If you want to see the world on a budget, there are ways to do it, whether it's out of necessity, a lifestyle or a challenge. In the end, they fall into two categories: Either you can work while you travel, or you can try to minimize expenses. This article looks at the latter. For those willing to give up comfort, time and predictability for the lowest possible costs, see travel on a shoestring budget. It assumes travelers do not steal, participate in the black market, beg or otherwise exploit others for their own gain.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: De mest utfordrende forholdene for kjøring på motorveien Buffalo–Pittsburgh, er strøket mellom Point Marion og Fairmont, som ofte går gjennom isolert bakskogterreng. Dersom du er uvant med å kjøre på landeveier, så hold hodet kaldt: det er mange bratte stigninger, smale veier og skarpe kurver. Fartsgrenser som er lagt ut er merkbart lavere enn i tidligere og påfølgende seksjoner – vanligvis 35–40 amerikanske mil i timen (56–64 km/t) – og det er enda viktigere å respektere dem enn ellers. Merkelig nok er mobildekningen mye bedre her enn langs mange andre steder langs ruten, f.eks. Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The most challenging conditions for driving on the Buffalo–Pittsburgh highway are the stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont, which often goes through isolated backwoods terrain. If you are unfamiliar with driving on country roads, keep your head cool: there are many steep inclines, narrow roads and sharp curves. Speed limits that are set are noticeably lower than in earlier and subsequent sections – usually 35–40 American miles per hour (56–64 km/h) – and it is even more important to respect them than elsewhere. Surprisingly, mobile coverage is much better here than along many other places along the route, e.g. Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Juving (eller juvvandring) innebærer å dra til en bunn av et juv, som enten er tørr eller full av vann. Juving er en kombinasjon av elementer fra svømming, klatring og hopping – det trengs også relativt lite opplæring eller fysisk form for å kunne begynne (sammenlignet med f.eks. fjellklatring, dykking eller alpinski).
mt: Juving (or juv-wandering) involves going to a bottom of a juv, which is either dry or full of water. Juving is a combination of elements from swimming, climbing and hopping – it also requires relatively little training or physical fitness to start (compared to e.g. mountain climbing, diving or alpine skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Å sette seg inn i egen bil og dra avgårde på en lang biltur gir i sin enkelhet en indre dragning. Du er nok allerede kjent med å kjøre bilen din og kjenner dens begrensninger i motsetning til større kjøretøy. Det å sette opp et telt på et privat sted eller i en by uansett størrelse, tiltrekker seg lett oppmerksomhet som ikke er ønsket. Kort sagt: Bilen er god å ha for en biltur, men er sjelden godt egnet for camping. Hvis du har en stor minibuss, SUV, Sedan eller stasjonsvogn med seter som kan legges ned er det mulig med bilcamping.
mt: To get into your own car and drive away on a long car trip is in its simplicity an inner attraction. You are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations compared to larger vehicles. To set up a tent on a private site or in a city regardless of size, attracts attention easily that is not wanted. In short: The car is good to have for a car trip, but is rarely well suited for camping. If you have a large minibus, SUV, sedan or station wagon with seats that can be folded down, it is possible with car camping.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Å sette seg inn i egen bil og dra avgårde på en lang biltur gir i sin enkelhet en indre dragning. Du er nok allerede kjent med å kjøre bilen din og kjenner dens begrensninger i motsetning til større kjøretøy. Det å sette opp et telt på et privat sted eller i en by uansett størrelse, tiltrekker seg lett oppmerksomhet som ikke er ønsket. Kort sagt: Bilen er god å ha for en biltur, men er sjelden godt egnet for camping. Hvis du har en stor minibuss, SUV, Sedan eller stasjonsvogn med seter som kan legges ned er det mulig med bilcamping.
mt: To get into your own car and drive away on a long car trip is in its simplicity an inner attraction. You are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations compared to larger vehicles. To set up a tent on a private site or in a city regardless of size, attracts attention easily that is not wanted. In short: The car is good to have for a car trip, but is rarely well suited for camping. If you have a large minibus, SUV, sedan or station wagon with seats that can be folded down, it is possible with car camping.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Byen vi kjenner som Casablanca i dag ble grunnlagt i det tiende århundre før vår tidsregning, og ble brukt som en strategisk havn under navnet Anfa av berberfiskere, fønikerne, romere og merenider. Portugiserne rev den ned, og bygget den opp igjen med navnet Casa Branca, for å deretter la den stå forlatt etter et jordskjelv i 1755. Den marokkanske sultanen bygde opp byen som Daru l-Badya, og den ble kalt Casablanca grunnet spanske kjøpmenn som hadde lagt til rette sine handelsbaser der. Casablanca er et av de kjedeligste shoppingstedene i hele Marokko. Steder der man kan få kjøpt tradisjonelle marokkanske varer, som for eksempel taginer, keramikk, skinnvarer, hettegenser og et helt spektrum av geiaer, er enkle å finne rundt den gamle medinaen, men de selges hovedsakelig til turistene.
mt: The city we know as Casablanca today was founded in the tenth century before our current reckoning, and was used as a strategic harbor under the name Anfa by Berber fishermen, Phoenicians, Romans and Merenid. The Portuguese razed it, and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, only to let it stand abandoned after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan built up the city as Daru l-Badya, and it was called Casablanca because of Spanish merchants who had set up their trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the most boring shopping centers in all of Morocco. Places where one can buy traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, ceramics, leather goods, hats, and a whole spectrum of geia, are easy to find around the old medina, but they are mainly sold to tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Nordover og ikke så altfor langt unna ligger den romantiske og fascinerende byen Sintra. Den ble gjort kjent blant utlendinger etter at Lord Byron ga den en glødende omtale. Scotturb-buss nr. 403 reiser jevnlig til Sintra og har et stopp ved Cabo da Roca. I nord må du også besøke den svære krypten Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima, et sted med marian kunst som er populær over hele verden.
mt: To the north and not too far away lies the romantic and fascinating city of Sintra. It was made known to foreigners after Lord Byron gave it a glowing review. Scotturb bus number 403 travels regularly to Sintra and has a stop at Cabo da Roca. In the north you must also visit the great crypt Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima, a place with Marian art that is popular all over the world.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Det etniske armenske Nagorno-Karabakh-området i Aserbajdsjan startet krigføring mot Azeris i 1994. Med armensk støtte, ble det opprettet en ny republikk. Men ingen etablert nasjon – ikke engang Armenia – anerkjenner denne offisielt. Diplomatiske uenigheter om regionen fortsetter å skade relasjonen mellom Armenia og Aserbajdsjan.
mt: 1994, the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan began fighting against the Azeris. With Armenian support, a new republic was established. But no established nation – not even Armenia – officially recognizes this. Diplomatic disagreements over the region continue to damage relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: En av plussidene med Charlotte i Nord-Carolina, er at det finnes en overflod av gode tilbud for familier. Beboere fra andre plasser oppgir ofte familievennlighet som den største grunnen for å flytte dit, og tilreisende finner ofte byen lett å kose seg i sammen med barna. I løpet av de siste 20 årene har andelen barnevennlige alternativer i sentrum av Charlotte vokst proporsjonalt med utviklingen. Til tross for at taxi kan være til nytte ved spesifikke omstendigheter, brukes de som regel ikke av familier i Charlotte. Det er en ekstra avgift for å frakte over to passasjerer, så dette kan bli mer kostbart enn det trengs.
mt: One of the pluses of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that there is a surplus of good family deals. Residents from other places often cite family friendliness as the main reason to move there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children. Over the past 20 years, the number of child-friendly options in the center of Charlotte has grown proportionally with development. Despite the fact that taxis can be useful in specific situations, they are usually not used by families in Charlotte. There is an extra fee to transport more than two passengers, so this can be more expensive than needed.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
