src: Før spanjolene kom på 1600-tallet, var det nordlige Chile under Inca-styre mens de indianske Araucanerne (Mapuche) bebodde det sentrale og sørlige Chile. Mapuche var en av de nyligste selvstendige amerikanske gruppene med urfolk, som ikke var absorbert inn i spanskpratende styre før etter Chiles uavhengighet. I 1810 erklærte Chile uavhengighet (midt i Napoleonskrigene som forårsaket at Spania ikke hadde noen fungerende sentralregjering i noen år), men den endelige seieren over spanjolene ble allikevel ikke oppnådd før 1818.
mt: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were one of the last independent American groups of indigenous people, not absorbed into the Spanish-speaking regime until after Chile's independence. In 1810, Chile declared independence (in the midst of the Napoleonic Wars which caused Spain to have no functioning central government for several years), but the final victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, som betyr Fem Land, har fem små kystlandsbyer. Disse er Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza og Monterosso med beliggenhet i det italienske området i Liguria. De står på UNESCOs verdensarvliste. I løpet av århundrene har mennesker med nøyaktighet bygd terrasser i det ujevne, bratte landskapet rett opp til klippene som overser havet. Landsbyene forbindes med stier, tog og båter, man kan ikke komme dit med bil og en del av sjarmen er mangelen på synlig bedriftsutvikling.
mt: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, has five small coastal villages. These are Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso with location in the Italian area in Liguria. They are on UNESCO's World Heritage List. Over the centuries people have built terraces in the uneven, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. The villages are connected with paths, trains and boats, you can not get there by car and part of the charm is the lack of visible business development.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Den mest vanligste grunnen til ulykker på vinterstid er glatte veier, fortau og spesielt trappetrinn. Et minimumskrav er fottøy med gode såler. Sommersko blir som regel veldig glatte på is og snø, selv ikke alle vintersko er gode nok. Mønsteret bør være på 5 mm (1/5 tommer) eller mer slik at det har nok dybde, og materialet må være mykt nok for kulde. Noen sko har pigger og det finnes ekstrautstyr med pigger for glatte forhold, som passer for de fleste sko og støvler, både med og uten hæl. Hæler bør være lave og brede. Ofte blir sand, grus eller salt (kalsiumklorid) spredt på veier eller stier for å gi en bedre gripeevne.
mt: The most common cause of accidents in the winter is slippery roads, ice and especially steps. A minimum requirement is footwear with good soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even not all winter shoes are good enough. The pattern should be at least 5 mm (1/5 inch) deep, and the material must be soft enough for cold. Some shoes have spikes and there are extra equipment with spikes for slippery conditions, which fits most shoes and boots, both with and without heel. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often spread on roads or trails to provide a better grip.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Cook-øyene er et øyrike lokalisert i Polynesia, midt i det sørlige Stillehavet, som har fri tilknytning til New Zealand. Det er en øygruppe som består av 15 øyer spredt ut over et havområde på 2,2 millioner km2. Siden øyene har samme tidssone som Hawaii er de ofte tenkt på som «Hawaii på motsatt halvkule». Men selv om den er litt mindre, så kan den minne eldre besøkende om Hawaii fra tiden før det ble en stat, før alle de store turisthotellene kom og annen utvikling. På Cooksøyene er det ikke noen byer, men gruppen består av 15 ulike øyer. Hovedøyene er Rarotonga og Aitutaki.
mt: Cook Islands are an archipelago located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean, which has free association with New Zealand. It is a group of 15 islands spread over an ocean area of 2.2 million km2. Since the islands have the same time zone as Hawaii, they are often thought of as "Hawaii on the other hemisphere". But even though it is a little smaller, it can remind older visitors of Hawaii before it became a state, before all the big tourist hotels came and other development. On the Cook Islands there are no cities, but the group consists of 15 different islands. The main islands are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Tillatelser må bestilles på forhånd. For å kunne overnatte på Sirena må du ha tillatelse. Sirena er den eneste skogvokterstasjonen der man både kan overnatte og få varm mat, samt camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, og Los Patos har kun camping uten matservering. Det er muligheter for å få parktillatelser rett fra Ranger-stasjonen i Puerto Jiménez, de aksepterer derimot ikke kredittkort. Parkeringstjenesten (MINAE) utsteder ikke parkeringstillatelser mer enn én måned i forkant av antatt ankomst. CafeNet El Sol tilbyr en reservasjonstjeneste for en kostnad på USD 30, eller USD 10 for dagspass. Du finner mer informasjon på Corcovado-siden deres.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. To be able to stay overnight at Sirena you must have a permit. Sirena is the only ranger station where you can stay overnight and get warm food, as well as camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only offer camping without food service. There are opportunities to get parking permits directly from the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The parking service (MINAE) does not issue parking permits more than one month in advance of expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a cost of USD 30, or USD 10 for day pass. You can find more information on their Corcovado site.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Tillatelser må bestilles på forhånd. For å kunne overnatte på Sirena må du ha tillatelse. Sirena er den eneste skogvokterstasjonen der man både kan overnatte og få varm mat, samt camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, og Los Patos har kun camping uten matservering. Det er muligheter for å få parktillatelser rett fra Ranger-stasjonen i Puerto Jiménez, de aksepterer derimot ikke kredittkort. Parkeringstjenesten (MINAE) utsteder ikke parkeringstillatelser mer enn én måned i forkant av antatt ankomst. CafeNet El Sol tilbyr en reservasjonstjeneste for en kostnad på USD 30, eller USD 10 for dagspass. Du finner mer informasjon på Corcovado-siden deres.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. To be able to stay overnight at Sirena you must have a permit. Sirena is the only ranger station where you can stay overnight and get warm food, as well as camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only offer camping without food service. There are opportunities to get parking permits directly from the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The parking service (MINAE) does not issue parking permits more than one month in advance of expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a cost of USD 30, or USD 10 for day pass. You can find more information on their Corcovado site.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Backpacking på ski: Denne aktiviteten har også andre navn som backcountry skiing, ski touring eller ski hiking. Det er knyttet til, men inkluderer som regel ikke skiløping i alpin stil, eller alpinklatring, det siste utføres i bratte terreng og da trengs det mye stivere ski og støvler. Tenk på en skiløype som noe av det samme som en tursti. Under gode forhold vil du kunne dekke større avstander enn hvis du går – men det er svært sjeldent vil du oppnå store hastigheter uten tung ryggsekk i spor.
mt: Backpacking on skis: This activity has also other names such as backcountry skiing, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to, but usually does not include alpine skiing, or alpine climbing, the latter is done in steep terrain and then you need much stiffer skis and boots. Think of a ski slope as something similar to a hiking trail. Under good conditions you can cover greater distances than if you walk - but it is very rare that you will achieve high speeds without a heavy backpack in the track.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Et retursjokk oppstår tidligere enn et kultursjokk (spenningsfasen er ikke der på samme måte som ved utflytting), det varer lenger, og kan bli mer alvorlig. Reisende som lett har tilpasset seg den nye kulturen har det av og til spesielt vanskelig med å tilpasse seg sin egen kultur på nytt. Når du returnerer hjem etter å ha vært boende i et annet land, så har du formet deg til den nye kulturen og mistet noen av de gamle vanene fra hjemmekulturen din. Den første gangen du reiste utenlands var folk sannsynligvis tålmodige og forståelsesfulle, siden de vet at den reisende må tilpasse seg et helt nytt land. Folk regner kanskje ikke med at tålmodighet og forståelse også trengs for reisende som returnerer hjem.
mt: A reverse culture shock occurs earlier than a culture shock (the tension phase is not there in the same way as with emigration), it lasts longer, and can be more serious. Travellers who have easily adapted to the new culture often have it particularly difficult to adapt to their own culture again. When you return home after having lived in another country, you have formed yourself to the new culture and lost some of the old habits from your home culture. The first time you travelled abroad, people were likely patient and understanding, since they know that the traveller must adapt to a whole new country. People may not expect patience and understanding to also be needed for travellers who return home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Elgen er ikke aggressiv i seg selv, men vil forsvare seg dersom den oppfatter en trussel. Når mennesker ser på elg som om de er ufarlig, kan de går for nært innpå og sette seg selv i risiko.
mt: Elk are not aggressive in themselves, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people look at elk as if they are harmless, they can go too close and put themselves at risk.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: På grunn av varmen på dagen kan reisende oppleve luftspeil som gir en illusjon av vann (eller andre ting). Disse kan være farlige hvis den reisende fortsetter å følge luftspeilet og med det sløser bort både dyrebar energi og resten av vannet. Til og med de varmeste ørkener kan bli veldig kalde om natten. Uten varme klær er det en reell risiko for hypotermi.
mt: Due to the heat of the day, travelers may experience mirages that give an illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler continues to follow the mirage and thus wastes both valuable energy and the rest of the water. Even the hottest deserts can be very cold at night. Without warm clothing, there is a real risk of hypothermia.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Den dominikanske republikken (på spansk: República Dominicana) er en karibisk nasjon på østdelen av Hispaniola-øyen, som er delt sammen med Haiti. Foruten de hvite sandstrendene og fjellandskapet, er dette landet også hjemmet til den eldste europeiske byen i Amerika – som nå har blitt en del av Santo Domingo. Taínos og Caribes var de første til å bosette seg på øya. Caribes var et Arawakan-pratende folk som kom rundt 10 000 f.Kr. Innen noen få år etter ankomst av europeiske oppdagere, hadde befolkningen i Tainos betydelig blitt redusert av de spanske erobrerne. Ifølge Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), tok de spanske erobrerne livet av rundt 100 000 Taínos mellom 1492 og 1498.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean nation on the eastern side of the island of Hispaniola, which is divided with Haiti. In addition to the white sand beaches and mountainous terrain, this country is also home to the oldest European city in the Americas – which is now part of Santo Domingo. Taínos and Caribes were the first to settle on the island. Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who came around 10,000 BC. Within a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the population of Taínos had been significantly reduced by the Spanish conquerors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Snøsporten i utforbakker, som omfatter både ski og snøbrett, er populære idretter som innebærer at man kjører ned på snødekte områder med ski eller snøbrett som er festet til føttene. Skiferie er en populær aktivitet med mange entusiaster, tidvis kjent som «skibomser», som planlegger hele ferier rundt å gå på ski på en bestemt plass. Tanken på å stå på ski er svært gammel – hulemalerier skildrer skigåere med dato tilbake til så langt som 5000 f.Kr! Alpint som sport, går minst tilbake til 1600-tallet. I 1861 ble den første fritidsbaserte skiklubben åpnet av nordmenn i Australia.
mt: Downhill skiing, which includes both skiing and snowboarding, is a popular sport that involves riding down snow-covered slopes on skis or snowboards attached to the feet. Skiing is a popular activity with many enthusiasts, sometimes known as "ski bums", who plan entire vacations around skiing at a particular place. The idea of skiing on skis is very old – cave paintings depict skiers with dates back to as far as 5000 BC! Alpine skiing as a sport, goes back at least to the 1600s. In 1861, the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: De østafrikanske øyene befinner seg i Indiahavet utenfor Afrikas østkyst. Madagaskar er den største av dem, og er et kontinent for seg selv når det kommer til dyreliv. De fleste mindre øyer er uavhengige nasjoner, eller assosiert med Frankrike, og kjent som luksusferiesteder. Araberne brakte i tillegg med seg islam til nasjonene, og det ble populært i Komorene og Mayotte. Europeisk innflytelse og kolonialisme startet i det 15. århundre, etter at den portugisiske oppdageren Vasco da Gama fant Kapp-ruten fra Europa til India.
mt: The East African islands are in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest of them, and is a continent of its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and are known as luxury resort destinations. Arab influence and Islam were brought to the nations by the Arabs, and it became popular in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism started in the 15th century, after the Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Det er en tradisjon å holde seg våken gjennom påskenatten på et eksponert punkt for å se soloppgangen. Det kan gjerne ha vært et førkristent vår- og fruktbarhetsrituale, men det finnes selvsagt også kristne teologiske tolkninger på denne tradisjonen. Flere tradisjonelle kirker holder ofte påskegudstjenesten på en lørdagskveld i påskehelgen, med kongressene som ofte starter feiringen av Kristi oppstandelse ved midnatt.
mt: It is a tradition to stay awake through the night of Easter to see the sunrise. It may have been a pre-Christian spring and fertility ritual, but there are of course also Christian theological interpretations of this tradition. Many traditional churches often hold Easter services on a Saturday night in Easter, with the congregations often starting the celebration of Christ's resurrection at midnight.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuador krever at cubanske statsborgere får et innkallingsbrev for å kunne komme inn i Ecuador gjennom internasjonale flyplasser eller grenseoverganger. Dette brevet må bli legalisert av det Ecuadorianske departementet og overholde bestemte krav. For å gi en organisert migrantflyt mellom begge landene ble disse kravene utformet. Cubanske statsborgere som har oppholdstillatelse i USA bør besøke et ecuadoriansk konsulat for å få fritak for dette kravet. Passet ditt må ha gyldighet i minst et halvt år utover reisedatoene dine. En billett for rundreise eller viderereise er viktig å ha for å kunne bekrefte oppholdslengden din.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to have a summons to be able to enter Ecuador through international airports or border crossings. This summons must be legalized by the Ecuadorian department and comply with certain requirements. To give an organized migrant flow between both countries, these requirements were formulated. Cuban citizens who have a US residence permit should visit an Ecuadorian consulate to be exempt from this requirement. Your passport must have validity for at least half a year after your travel dates. A round-trip ticket or onward ticket is important to have to confirm your stay length.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Briller kan bli billigere i et fremmed land, spesielt i lavinntektsland der arbeidskostnader er lavere. Vurder å få utført en øyeundersøkelse hjemme, i hvert fall dersom forsikringen dekker det, og ta med deg resepten og lever den inn et annet sted. Rammer av de beste merkene som finnes i slike områder kan ha to problemer; noen kan være etterligninger og de som er ekte og importert kan være dyrere enn de som finnes hjemme.
mt: Glasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. Consider having an eye exam done at home, at least if the insurance covers it, and take the prescription with you and fill it elsewhere. Counterfeits of the best brands available in such areas can have two problems; some can be fakes and those that are genuine and imported can be more expensive than those available at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Briller kan bli billigere i et fremmed land, spesielt i lavinntektsland der arbeidskostnader er lavere. Vurder å få utført en øyeundersøkelse hjemme, i hvert fall dersom forsikringen dekker det, og ta med deg resepten og lever den inn et annet sted. Rammer av de beste merkene som finnes i slike områder kan ha to problemer; noen kan være etterligninger og de som er ekte og importert kan være dyrere enn de som finnes hjemme.
mt: Glasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. Consider having an eye exam done at home, at least if the insurance covers it, and take the prescription with you and fill it elsewhere. Counterfeits of the best brands available in such areas can have two problems; some can be fakes and those that are genuine and imported can be more expensive than those available at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Falklandspund (FKP) er den offisielle Falklandsvalutaen, dersom verdi er satt tilsvarende verdien av ett britisk pund (GBP). Penger kan veksles på øyens eneste bank som ligger i Stanley ovenfor FIC West-butikken. Britiske pund vil generelt bli akseptert hvor som helst på øyene og innenfor Stanley-kredittkort og amerikanske dollar er også ofte akseptert. Kredittkort blir trolig ikke akseptert på de utliggende øyene, men britiske og amerikanske valutaer kan bli godtatt; sjekk med eierne i forkant for å finne ut hva som er en godkjent betalingsmetode. Det er vanskelig å skulle veksle Falklandsvaluta utenfor øyene, så pass på å veksle penger før du forlater øyene.
mt: Falkland pound (FKP) is the official currency of the Falkland Islands, if the value is set equivalent to the value of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged on the island's only bank located in Stanley above FIC West-shop. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere on the islands and within Stanley credit cards and American dollars are also often accepted. Credit cards are likely not accepted on the outlying islands, but British and American currencies may be accepted; check with the owners in advance to find out what is an accepted payment method. It is difficult to exchange Falklands currency outside the islands, so be sure to exchange money before you leave the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Det er en festival hvert år fra slutten av november til midten av mai i de fleste templer, som varierer med tanke på hvert enkelte tempels årlige kalender. De fleste tempelfestivalene feires som en del av tempelets jubileumsdag, styres av bursdagen til en guddom, eller andre store arrangement knyttet til tempelet. Keralas tempelfestivaler er svært spennende å få med seg, med et opptog av pyntede elefanter, tempelorkester og andre festligheter.
mt: There is a festival every year from the end of November to mid-May in most temples, which varies according to each individual temple's annual calendar. Most temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple's anniversary day, governed by the birthday of a deity, or other major events related to the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very exciting to catch up with, with a procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestras and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Den åpenbare måten å fly på i første klasse eller forretningsklasse, er å gafle ut en tykk bunke penger for privilegiet (eller enda bedre, få din bedrift til å gjøre det for deg). Dette blir derimot ikke rimelig: Som en røff tommelfingerregel kan du forberede deg på å måtte betale opptil fire ganger mer enn vanlig økonomipris for business-klasse, og elleve ganger mer for første klasse! Generelt sett er det ikke noe poeng i å lete etter rabatter for business eller seter første klasse på direkteflyvninger fra A til B. Flyselskaper vet godt at det er en viss gruppe flyvende som er villige til å betale godt for å komme et sted raskt og komfortabelt, og betale deretter.
mt: The obvious way to fly in first or business class is to flash a thick wad of cash for the privilege (or better yet, get your company to do it for you). This, however, is not cheap: As a rough rule of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the regular economy price for business class, and eleven times for first class! In general, there is no point in looking for discounts for business or first class on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know that there is a certain group of flyers willing to pay well to get somewhere quickly and comfortably, and then pay again.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Flyselskaper som Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways og Turkish Airlines har stort sett utvidet sine tjenester til Afrika, og sammenlignet med andre europeiske flyselskaper tilbyr de fly til en rekke store afrikanske byer ved konkurransedyktig prissetting. I 2014 flydde Turkish Airlines til 39 steder i 30 afrikanske land. Hvis du har ekstra reisetid, sjekk for å se hvordan din totale billettpris til Afrika er sammenlignet med en verdensomfattende billett. Husk å legge til ekstrakostnader for ekstra visum, avreiseavgift, transport på land osv. for alle stedene utenfor Afrika.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have mostly expanded their services to Africa, and compared to other European airlines, they offer flights to a number of large African cities at competitive prices. In 2014, Turkish Airlines flew to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have extra travel time, check to see how your total ticket price to Africa compares to a worldwide ticket. Remember to add extra costs for extra visas, departure fees, land transport etc. for all places outside Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Den billigste måten å skaffe seg mat på er å kjøpe mat i supermarkeder. Uten kokemuligheter er valget likevel begrenset til ferdigmat. Supermarkeder får stadig mer variert utvalg av ferdigmat. Noen har til og med en mikrobølgeovn eller andre muligheter til å varme mat. I enkelte land eller i visse type butikker finnes det minst en restaurant på stedet som ofte er ganske uformell og med rimeligere priser.
mt: The cheapest way to get food is to buy food in supermarkets. Without cooking facilities, the choice is limited to ready meals. Supermarkets are getting more varied range of ready meals. Some even have a microwave oven or other facilities to heat food. In some countries or in certain types of stores there is at least one restaurant on the spot which is often informal and with more affordable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: De fransk-variantene som prates i Belgia og Sveits skiller seg litt ut fra den fransken som snakkes i Frankrike, men de høres likevel nokså like ut til å kunne forstå hverandre. Tallsystemet i fransktalende Belgia og Sveits har noen små særegenheter som er annerledes enn fransken som prates i Frankrike, og uttalen av enkelte ord har diverse ulikheter. Alle fransktalende belgiere og sveitsere ville fortsatt ha lært standard fransk i løpet av skoleårene, så de hadde klart å forstå deg selv om du benyttet det typiske franske tallsystemet.
mt: The French variants spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, but they are still quite similar and can be understood. The number system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some small peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words has various differences. All French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French during school years, so they would have been able to understand you even if you used the typical French number system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Bare noen få flyselskap tilbyr fortsatt sorgpriser, som til en viss grad reduserer kostnadene med bisettelsesreiser med kort frist. Flyselskapene som leverer disse er blant annet Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flyvninger som kommer fra USA eller Canada, og WestJet. Du kan kun bestille ved å ringe flyselskapet direkte.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which to some extent reduce the costs of funeral travel with short notice. Airlines that offer these are among others Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. You can only order by calling the airline directly.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Det å bruke GPS-apper på smarttelefonen kan være den letteste og mest hensiktsmessige metoden for å finne fram på når man er utenfor eget land. Det kan bli billigere enn å kjøpe kart for GPS, eller en separat GPS-enhet eller leie en fra et bilutleiefirma. Ytelsen kan være begrenset eller utilgjengelig dersom du ikke har internettforbindelse på mobilen, eller når forbindelsen er utenfor rekkevidde.
mt: Using GPS apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most practical way to find your way around when you are outside your own country. It can be cheaper than buying maps for GPS, or a separate GPS unit or renting one from a car rental company. Performance can be limited or inaccessible if you do not have internet access on your mobile, or when the connection is out of range.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Den beste måten å se Galapagos og dyrelivet der på er med båt, akkurat sånn som Charles Darwin gjorde det i 1835. Mer enn 60 cruiseskip krysser Galapagos-farvannet – med 8–100 passasjerer. De fleste booker sin plass i god tid på forhånd (siden båtene vanligvis er fulle i løpet av høysesongen). Pass på at byrået som du bestiller fra er spesialist på Galapagos og har god kunnskap om et bredt utvalg av skip. Dette vil sikre at dine særinteresser og/eller begrensninger vil bli matchet med skipet som er best egnet.
mt: The best way to see the Galapagos and its wildlife is by boat, just as Charles Darwin did in 1835. More than 60 cruise ships cross the Galapagos waters – with 8–100 passengers. Most book their place well in advance (since the boats are usually full during the high season). Be careful that the agency you book from is a specialist on Galapagos and has good knowledge of a wide range of ships. This will ensure that your special interests and/or limitations will be matched with the ship that is best suited.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasinoer pleier å gjøre mange forsøk for å maksimere hvor mye tid og penger som brukes av gjestene. Vinduer og klokker er vanligvis fraværende og utgangene kan være vanskelig å finne. De har som regel spesiell mat, drikke og underholdningstilbud til gjestene, for at de skal være i godt humør og for at de skal ønske å bli værende på stedet. Noen arenaer tilbyr gratis alkoholholdige drikkevarer. Men alkoholpåvirkning nedsetter dømmekraften, alle gode gamblere vet hvor viktig det er å holde seg edru.
mt: Casinos usually make many attempts to maximize how much time and money is spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offerings to guests, so that they will be in good spirits and so that they will want to stay at the place. Some arenas offer free alcoholic beverages. But alcohol intoxication lowers judgment, all good gamblers know how important it is to stay sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Alle substantiver som står sammen med ordet Sie for deg, starter alltid med stor bokstav, selv om det er midt i en setning. Dette er en betydningsfull metode for å kunne skille mellom noen verb og gjenstander på. Det gjør også lesingen uten tvil enklere, selv om skrivingen er litt vanskelig, siden man da må finne ut om et verb eller adjektiv blir brukt i substantivert form.
mt: All nouns that stand together with the word Sie for you, always start with a capital letter, even if it is in the middle of a sentence. This is an important method to be able to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also makes reading without doubt easier, even if the writing is a little difficult, since you then have to find out if a verb or adjective is used in noun form.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: Vinking er en vennlig gest som indikerer «hallo» i mange deler av verden. I Malaysia derimot, i hvert fall blant Malayene i landlige områder, betyr det «kom hit», nesten som når pekefingeren bøyes mot kroppen, en gest som brukes i visse vestlige kulturer, og bare bør brukes på den måten. På tilsvarende måte kan en britisk reisende i Spania kanskje dumme seg ut med å vinke ha det med håndflaten vendt mot den som vinker (i stedet for den personen det vinkets til) som en gest for å komme tilbake.
mt: Waving is a friendly gesture that indicates "hello" in many parts of the world. In Malaysia, however, at least among Malays in rural areas, it means "come here", almost like when the index finger is bent towards the body, a gesture used in certain Western cultures, and only should be used in that way. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain might foolishly wave back with the palm of the hand facing the person waving (instead of the person being waved to) as a gesture to come back.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Vinking er en vennlig gest som indikerer «hallo» i mange deler av verden. I Malaysia derimot, i hvert fall blant Malayene i landlige områder, betyr det «kom hit», nesten som når pekefingeren bøyes mot kroppen, en gest som brukes i visse vestlige kulturer, og bare bør brukes på den måten. På tilsvarende måte kan en britisk reisende i Spania kanskje dumme seg ut med å vinke ha det med håndflaten vendt mot den som vinker (i stedet for den personen det vinkets til) som en gest for å komme tilbake.
mt: Waving is a friendly gesture that indicates "hello" in many parts of the world. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain might foolishly wave back with the palm of the hand facing the person waving (instead of the person being waved to) as a gesture to come back.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Isbreene er ikke stabile, men strømmer ned fjellet. Dette forårsaker sprekker som kan bli formørket av snøbroer. Veggene og takene i ishuler kan kollapse og åpninger kan lukkes. Ved kanten av en isbre bryter store blokker seg løs, deretter faller de ned og hopper eller ruller ofte lenger fra kanten.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This causes crevasses that can be covered by snow bridges. The walls and ceilings of ice caves can collapse and openings can close. At the edge of a glacier large blocks break off, then fall down and bounce or roll away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma er en turistby i den demokratiske republikken Kongo og ligger i øst i nærheten av Rwanda. I 2002 ble Goma ødelagt av lava som kom fra utbruddet i Nyiragongo-vulkanen, utbruddet førte til at mesteparten av byens gater, spesielt byens sentrum, ble nedgravd. Selv om Goma er ganske trygg, bør alle besøk utenfor Goma leses om på forhånd for å forstå seg på kampene som pågår i Nord-Kivu-provinsen. Byen er også en base for klatring oppover vulkanen Nyiragongo sammen med noen av de rimeligste fjellturene for å se gorillaer i Afrika. For å komme deg rundt i Goma kan du bruke boda-boda (motorsykkeltaxi). Vanlig (lokal) pris er omtrent 500 kongolesiske francs for en kort tur.
mt: Goma is a tourist town in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and is located in the east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the eruption of Nyiragongo volcano, the eruption led to most of the city's streets, especially the city center, being buried. Although Goma is quite safe, all visits outside Goma should be read about in advance to understand the ongoing battles in North Kivu province. The city is also a base for climbing up the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest mountain hikes to see gorillas in Africa. To get around in Goma you can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi). Local (local) price is about 500 Congolese francs for a short trip.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: All camping under kanten av Grand Canyon krever baklandstillatelse. For å beskytte dalen er det begrenset med tillatelser, og de blir tilgjengelig på den 1. dagen i måneden, fire måneder før startmåneden. En «backcountry permit» (tillatelse til å overnatte i villmarken) for alle startdatoer i mai, vil være tilgjengelig 1. jan. Plass til de mest populære områdene, som for eksempel Bright Angel campingplass i nærheten av Phantom Ranch, fylles generelt opp av forespørsler mottatt på første dagen de er åpnet for reservasjoner. Det er et begrenset antall tillatelser som er forbeholdt drop-in-forespørsler basert på «førstemann til mølla»-prinsippet.
mt: All camping below the rim of the Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. To protect the canyon, permits are limited, and they become available on the first day of the month, four months before the start month. A "backcountry permit" for all start dates in May, will be available January 1. Space for the most popular areas, such as Bright Angel campground near Phantom Ranch, is generally filled by requests received on the first day they are opened for reservations. There is a limited number of permits held for drop-in requests based on a "first come, first served" principle.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Noen hoteller har en arv fra gullalderen for dampbaner og havfartøyer; fra før andre verdenskrig, 1800-tallet eller fra tidlig på 1900-tallet. På disse hotellene oppholdte tidens rike og kjente seg, med flotte spiseopplevelser og natteliv. En del av karakteren er i tillegg den gammeldagse innredningen, mangelen på de nyeste fasilitetene og en spesifikk grasiøs aldring. Selv om de vanligvis er privateide, har de av og til plass til besøkende statshoder og andre høye embetsmenn. En reisende som er full av penger kan kanskje vurdere en runde med verdenflyvning, delt opp med opphold på mange av disse hotellene.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy from the golden age of steam trains and ships; from before World War II, the 19th century or early 20th century. These hotels were frequented by the rich and famous of their time, with fine dining and nightlife. Some of the character is also the old-fashioned decor, the lack of the latest facilities and a specific graceful aging. Although they are usually privately owned, they sometimes have room for visiting heads of state and other high officials. A traveler who is full of money may consider a round-the-world flight, divided up with stays at many of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: 93 prosent av Grønlands befolkning har internettilgang på grunn av fiberoptiske kabelkoblinger som går under sjøen til Europa og på grunn av bredbåndssatellitt. Hotell eller vertskapet (dersom du bor i et gjestehus eller privat hjem) vil vanligvis ha trådløst internett eller en PC tilkoblet internett, alle landsbyer har en internettkafé eller et annet sted med offentlig trådløst internett. Som nevnt over på tross av at «eskimo» fortsatt er akseptabelt i USA, blir det sett på som nedverdigende av mange ikke-amerikanske arktiske folkeslag, særlig i Canada. Bruken av ordet bør unngås av utlendinger, selv om du kanskje hører ordet brukt av grønlandske innfødte. På Grønland omtaler de innfødte beboerne seg for inuitter i Canada og Kalaalleq (flertall Kalaallit), grønlendere, på Grønland. På Grønland er kriminalitet og uvilje mot utlendinger så godt som ikke eksisterende. Selv i byene er det ingen «belastede områder». Den uforberedte står kanskje bare overfor kaldt vær som den eneste virkelige trusselen. Det er helt avgjørende å få med seg nok varme klær hvis du besøker Grønland under kalde sesonger (ut i fra den tanken at jo lenger nord du går, jo kaldere blir det). De lange sommerdagene kan gjøre det utfordrende å få tilstrekkelig med søvn og gi helseproblemer i tilknytning til det. Se også opp for den nordiske myggen om sommeren. Selv om de ikke overfører noen sykdommer, kan de være ganske irriterende.
mt: 93% of Greenland's population has internet access due to fiber optic cables that go under the sea to Europe and broadband satellites. Hotels or the host (if you are staying in a guest house or private home) will usually have wireless internet or a PC connected to the internet, all villages have an internet cafe or other place with public wireless internet. As mentioned above, despite "Eskimo" still being acceptable in the US, it is seen as derogatory by many non-American Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. The use of the word should be avoided by outsiders, even though you may hear the word used by Greenlandic natives. In Greenland, the native inhabitants refer to themselves as Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), Greenlanders, in Greenland. In Greenland, crime and hostility towards outsiders is virtually non-existent. Even in the cities there are no "dangerous areas". The unprepared may only face cold weather as the only real threat. It is absolutely essential to bring enough warm clothes if you visit Greenland during cold seasons (from the perspective that the further north you go, the colder it gets). The long summer days can make it difficult to get enough sleep and cause health problems related to that. See also to the Nordic mosquito during the summer. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be quite annoying.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Dette stedet ble opprettet som atrium for et 1600-tallets kloster, hvorav Templo de San Diego er den eneste bygningen som er igjen. Den fungerer nå som et sentrumstorg og her er det alltid mye som skjer, både dag og natt. Hagen er omringet av flere restauranter, og om ettermiddagen og på kveldstid arrangeres det ofte gratiskonserter i lysthuset i midten. Callejon del Beso (Kysse-alléen). To balkonger som bare er 69 centimeter fra hverandre er opphavsstedet til et gammelt kjærlighetssagn. Enkelte barn vil fortelle deg historien for å få penger.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. This place was created as atrium for a 17th century monastery, of which Templo de San Diego is the only building left. It now functions as a town square and there is always much going on, both day and night. The garden is surrounded by several restaurants, and in the afternoon and evening free concerts are often held in the gazebo in the middle. Callejon del Beso (Kiss alley). Two balconies that are only 69 centimeters apart are the birthplace of an old love story. Some children will tell you the story to get money.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: En fottur er en utendørsaktivitet som innebærer vandring i naturlige omgivelser, ofte på turstier. Dagsturer er turer på mindre enn 1 km opp til lengre avstander som kan dekkes i løpet av 1 dag. Det er kun enkle forberedelser som skal til for en dagstur langs en lett tursti og alle som er i relativt god form kan glede seg over det. Selv om familier med små barn kan trenge flere forberedelser er det helt mulig med en dag utendørs, selv med babyer og førskolebarn.
mt: A day hike is an outdoor activity that involves walking in natural surroundings, often on hiking trails. Day hikes are trips of less than 1 km up to longer distances that can be covered in one day. There are only simple preparations needed for a day hike along an easy hiking trail and all who are in relatively good shape can enjoy it. Although families with small children may need more preparations, it is possible to have a day outdoors, even with babies and preschool children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: En fottur er en utendørsaktivitet som innebærer vandring i naturlige omgivelser, ofte på turstier. Dagsturer er turer på mindre enn 1 km opp til lengre avstander som kan dekkes i løpet av 1 dag. Det er kun enkle forberedelser som skal til for en dagstur langs en lett tursti og alle som er i relativt god form kan glede seg over det. Selv om familier med små barn kan trenge flere forberedelser er det helt mulig med en dag utendørs, selv med babyer og førskolebarn.
mt: A day hike is an outdoor activity that involves walking in natural surroundings, often on hiking trails. Day hikes are trips of less than 1 km up to longer distances that can be covered in one day. There are only simple preparations needed for a day hike along an easy hiking trail and all who are in relatively good shape can enjoy it. Although families with small children may need more preparations, it is possible to have a day outdoors, even with babies and preschool children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Bratte fjorder og daler som plutselig går over i en mer eller mindre jevn høyslette er karakteristisk for Norge. Disse platåene omtales som regel som «vidder», som refererer til et bredt, åpent treløst område, en grenseløs vidde. I Rogaland og Agder heter det som regel «hei», som refererer til en treløs myrmark som ofte er dekket av lyng.
mt: Steep fjords and valleys that suddenly turn into a more or less flat plateau are characteristic of Norway. These plateaus are usually referred to as "heaths", which refers to a broad, open treeless area, a borderless heath. In Rogaland and Agder, it is usually called "heath", which refers to a treeless boggy area that is often covered with heather.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Turistsesongen for høydestasjonene er som regel på topp under den indiske sommeren. De har derimot en annen form for skjønnhet og sjarm når det er vinter, med mange bakkestasjoner med gode snømengder og som tilbyr aktiviteter som ski og snowboard.
mt: The tourist season for high-altitude stations is usually at its peak during the Indian summer. They have a different kind of beauty and charm when it is winter, with many backcountry stations with good snow cover and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Du kan være sikker på at når du først er i havn så vil alt være veldig lett å forstå. Du vil treffe andre båthaikere og de vil dele sin informasjon med deg. Kort sagt vil det dreie seg om at du henger opp lapper hvor du tilbyr dine tjenester, vandrer rundt på kaien, tar kontakt med folk som vasker yachtene sine, prøver å ta kontakt med sjøfolk i baren, osv. Snakk med så mange som mulig. Etter en stund vil alle kjenne deg igjen og fortelle når de hører om båter som ser etter folk.
mt: You can be sure that once you are in port everything will be very easy to understand. You will meet other yachties and they will share their information with you. In short, you will hang up sheets where you offer your services, wander around the dock, take contact with people who wash their yachts, try to take contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and tell when they hear about boats looking for people.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Navnet Hong Kong kommer fra Hong Kong Island, og er stedet som mange turister betrakter som hovedfokus. Paraden av bygninger som utgjør skylinjen i Hong Kong har blitt sammenlignet med et glitrende stolpediagram som vises tydelig takket være farvannet som utgjør Victoria Harbor. Hvis du vil ha den fineste utsikten over Hong Kong kan du forlate øya og reise til Kowloons vannfront som ligger overfor. Størstedelen av Hong Kong-øyas byutvikling er tettpakket på gjenoppbyggingsland langs den nordlige kysten. Dette er plassen som de britiske kolonistene tok over, og dette en god plass å begynne dersom du leter etter bevis på territoriets koloniale fortid.
mt: The name Hong Kong comes from Hong Kong Island, and is the place that many tourists consider the main focus. The parade of buildings that make up the skyline of Hong Kong has been compared to a glittering bar chart that is clearly visible thanks to the waters that make up Victoria Harbor. If you want the best view of Hong Kong, you can leave the island and travel to the waterfront of Kowloon, which is across the water. Most of the Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on the reclamation land along the northern coast. This is the place that the British colonists took over, and this is a good place to start if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Stigbøyler henger ned på hver side av salen og er støtter for rytteren. De gir mer stabilitet for rytteren, men kan være mindre trygg grunnet muligheten for at en rytter blir sittende fast. Dersom en rytter kastes fra en hest med en fot fast i stigbøylen, kan han bli dradd etter hesten dersom den løper bort. For å forminske denne faren kan mange forholdsregler bli tatt. De fleste ryttere bruker for det første ridestøvler med hæl og en glatt, ganske smal såle. Deretter har noen saler, spesielt engelske saler, sikkerhetsstenger som gjør at læret til stigbøylen faller ned fra salen dersom det blir trukket bakover av en fallende rytter.
mt: Stirrup leathers hang down on each side of the saddle and are supports for the rider. They give more stability for the rider, but can be less safe due to the possibility of a rider being stuck. If a rider is thrown from a horse with one foot stuck in the stirrup, he can be dragged after the horse if it runs away. To reduce this danger, many precautions can be taken. Most riders first use riding boots with heel and a smooth, fairly narrow sole. Then some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety stirrup leathers that make the stirrup leather fall down from the saddle if it is pulled backwards by a falling rider.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Et nettverk for overnattingsutveksling er organisasjonen som knytter reisende med lokalbefolkningen i byene de skal reise til. For å bli med i et slikt nettverk behøver man vanligvis bare å fylle ut et nettskjema; men enkelte nettverk tilbyr eller krever ekstra verifisering. En liste over tilgjengelige verter er deretter levert enten på trykk og/eller på nett, noen ganger med referanser og anmeldelser av andre reisende. Couchsurfing ble stiftet i januar 2004 når dataprogrammereren Casey Fenton fant en billig flytur til Island uten å ha noe sted å overnatte. Han fikk et overveldende antall tilbud om gratis overnatting da han sendte mail til studenter på det lokale universitetet.
mt: A network for overnight exchange is the organization that connects travelers with local residents in the cities they are traveling to. To join such a network, you usually just have to fill out an online form; but some networks offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then delivered either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews from other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 when software programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland without having a place to stay. He received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation when he sent emails to students at the local university.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Herberger henvender seg primært til ungdommer – gjester er som regel i tjueårene, men det er også eldre reisende der i tillegg. Det er sjeldent med familier med barn, men enkelte vertskap legger til rette for dem i private rom.
mt: Herberger primarily addresses youth – guests are usually in their twenties, but there are also older travelers there in addition. It is rare for families with children, but some hosts make arrangements for them in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: En godt likt ferdighet som mange turister ønsker å lære er boomerang-kasting. Hvis du har lyst til å kunne kaste en boomerang slik at den returnerer til deg, bør du passe på at du har en boomerang som egner seg til dette. Mesteparten av boomerangene som finnes i Australia kommer faktisk ikke i retur. Det er lurest for nybegynnere at de ikke forsøker å kaste inn i vinden.
mt: A well liked skill that many tourists wish to learn is boomerang throwing. If you want to be able to throw a boomerang so that it returns to you, you should make sure that you have a boomerang that is suitable for this. Most of the boomerangs that are found in Australia do not return. It is best for beginners not to try to throw into the wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Med 17 000 øyer å skulle velge mellom, er indonesiske matretter en paraplybetegnelse, som dekker et bredt utvalg av regionale kjøkken over hele nasjonen. Hvis den brukes uten ytterligere pekepinner, så betyr imidlertid begrepet som regel mat som opprinnelig kommer fra de sentrale og østlige delene av hovedøya Java. Nå er mye tilgjengelig over hele øygruppen, det javanesiske kjøkken kjennetegnes av lettkrydrede retter, med en dominerende smak av peanøtter, chili, sukker, (spesielt javanesisk kokossukker) og ulike aromatiske kryddere.
mt: 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is a catch-all term that covers a broad range of regional cuisines across the nation. However, if used without further pointers, the term usually refers to food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Much is now available across the archipelago, the Javanese cuisine is characterized by light dishes, with a dominant taste of peanuts, chili, sugar, (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: For de som ikke er kjent med den medisinske ordbruken, har ordene infeksiøs og kontagiøs ulike betydninger. Smittsomme sykdommer forårsakes av et patogen, som f.eks. virus, bakterie, sopp eller andre parasitter. En smittsom sykdom er en sykdom som lett kan bli overført ved å være nær en som har sykdommen. Mange regjeringer krever at besøkende som kommer til landet eller borgere som reiser fra landet skal vaksineres for et bestemt antall sykdommer. Disse kravene avhenger ofte av hvilke land en reisende har besøkt eller planlegger å besøke.
mt: For those not familiar with medical terminology, the words infectious and contagious have different meanings. Infectious diseases are caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is one that can easily be transmitted by being near someone who has the disease. Many governments require visitors to the country or citizens traveling from the country to be vaccinated for a certain number of diseases. These requirements often depend on which countries a traveler has visited or plans to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: En personlig VPN-formidler (virtuelt privat nettverk) er en super metode for å unngå både politisk sensurering og forretningsmessig IP-geofiltrering. Det er flere grunner til at de er overlegne på nett-proxyer: De omkjører all internettrafikk, ikke bare http. Vanligvis kommer de med høyere båndbredde og bedre kvalitet på servicen. De er også kryptert og derfor mer problematisk å skulle spionere på.
mt: A personal VPN provider (virtual private network) is a super way to avoid both political censorship and business IP geofiltering. They are superior to net proxies for several reasons: They circumvent all internet traffic, not just http. Usually they come with higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are also encrypted and therefore more problematic to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
