mt: A personal VPN provider (virtual private network) is a super way to avoid both political censorship and business IP geofiltering. They are superior to net proxies for several reasons: They circumvent all internet traffic, not just http. Usually they come with higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are also encrypted and therefore more problematic to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Fordi telefonsamtaler rutes over internettet, behøver du ikke å bruke et telefonselskap som holder til der du bor eller der du reiser. Det er heller ikke påkrevd at du har et lokalt nummer fra lokalsamfunnet der du bor, du kan få tak i en satellitt-internettilkobling i villmarka i Chicken, Alaska og velge et nummer som viser at du er i solrike Arizona. Man må ofte kjøpe et globalt nummer separat slik at PSTN-telefoner kan ringe til deg. Det gjør en forskjell for folk som ringer deg hvor nummeret er fra.
mt: Because phone calls route over the Internet, you don't need to use a phone company that is based where you live or where you travel. It's also not required that you have a local number from the community where you live, you can get a satellite Internet connection in the wilderness of Chicken, Alaska and choose a number that shows you are in sunny Arizona. You often have to buy a global number separately so that PSTN phones can call you. This makes a difference for people who call you from where the number is from.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Fordi telefonsamtaler rutes over internettet, behøver du ikke å bruke et telefonselskap som holder til der du bor eller der du reiser. Det er heller ikke påkrevd at du har et lokalt nummer fra lokalsamfunnet der du bor, du kan få tak i en satellitt-internettilkobling i villmarka i Chicken, Alaska og velge et nummer som viser at du er i solrike Arizona. Man må ofte kjøpe et globalt nummer separat slik at PSTN-telefoner kan ringe til deg. Det gjør en forskjell for folk som ringer deg hvor nummeret er fra.
mt: Because phone calls route over the Internet, you don't need to use a phone company that is based where you live or where you travel. It's also not required that you have a local number from the community where you live, you can get a satellite Internet connection in the wilderness of Chicken, Alaska and choose a number that shows you are in sunny Arizona. You often have to buy a global number separately so that PSTN phones can call you. This makes a difference for people who call you from where the number is from.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Uttalen er forholdsvis lett på italiensk, ettersom de fleste ordene uttales akkurat slik de er skrevet. Hovedbokstavene man må være obs på er c og g, siden deres uttale er forskjellig basert på den følgende vokalen. I tillegg bør du passe på siden uttalen for r og rr er annerledes: caro betyr kjære, mens carro betyr vogn.
mt: Italian is relatively easy to pronounce, as most words are pronounced exactly as they are written. The only letters you need to be careful with are c and g, as their pronunciation depends on the following vowel. In addition, you should be careful with the pronunciation of r and rr, as they are different: caro means dear, while carro means carriage.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir er den 3. største byen i Tyrkia med en befolkning på omtrent 3,7 millioner. Izmir er nest største havnen etter Istanbul og er et svært godt sentrum for transport. Smyrna var tidligere bare en gammel by, men er nå et moderne, utviklet og travelt kommersielt senter som befinner seg rundt en stor bukt og omringet av fjell. De brede avenyene, bygningene med glassfasade og moderne kjøpesentre er tegnet inn med tradisjonelle røde skråtak, torget fra det 18. århundret sammen med gamle moskeer og kirker, selv om byen har en atmosfære mer lignende det europeiske middelhavsområdet enn det tradisjonelle Tyrkia.
mt: Izmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of about 3.7 million. Izmir is the second largest port after Istanbul and is a very well developed center for transport. Smyrna was formerly just an old city, but is now a modern, developed and busy commercial center that is located around a large bay and surrounded by mountains. The wide avenues, buildings with glass facades and modern shopping centers are designed with traditional red gables, the square from the 18th century along with old mosques and churches, even though the city has an atmosphere more like the European Mediterranean than the traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Kirsebærblomstrene som vises har vært en del av japansk kultur siden det 8. århundre og er også kjent som hanami. Konseptet kom fra Kina der blomstrende plommeblomster var den mest populære blomsten. De første kirsebærblomstringsfestene ble arrangert av keiseren i Japan kun for seg selv og andre medlemmer av aristokratiet rundt den keiserlige domstolen.
mt: The cherry blossoms shown have been part of Japanese culture since the 8th century and are also known as hanami. The concept came from China where flowering plum blossoms were the most popular flower. The first cherry blossom viewing parties were arranged by the emperor of Japan only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Den største byen i Israel er Jerusalem og det er også landets hovedstad selv om dette ikke er anerkjent av FN og de fleste andre land. Den eldgamle byen i Judean høydene har en fascinerende historie, som strekker seg over flere tusen år. De tre monoteistiske religionene – jødedommen, kristendommen og islam, anser byen for hellig og for dem tjener den som et spirituelt, religiøst og kulturelt sentrum. Jerusalem er en av hovedturistattraksjonene i Israel på grunn av byens religiøse betydning. Dette gjelder spesielt for mange steder i det gamle byområdet. Jerusalem har en rekke historiske, arkeologiske og kulturelle steder, sammen med trivelige og fylte shoppingsentre, caféer og restauranter.
mt: Jerusalem is the largest city in Israel and is also the country's capital, although this is not recognized by the UN and most other countries. The ancient city in the Judean hills has a fascinating history, which stretches over several thousand years. The three monotheistic religions – Judaism, Christianity and Islam, consider the city holy and for them it serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Jerusalem is one of the main tourist attractions in Israel due to the city's religious significance. This applies especially to many places in the old city area. Jerusalem has a number of historical, archaeological and cultural sites, along with pleasant and busy shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Kruger nasjonalpark (KNP) ligger nord-øst i Sør-Afrika i øst grenser den til Mosambik, i nord til Zimbabwe, og Crocodile River er den sørlige grensen. Parken er på 19 500 km² og kan deles inn i 14 ulike økosoner, som støtter ulikt dyreliv. Dette er en av de mest populære attraksjonene i Sør-Afrika og det anses som den flotteste nasjonalparken i Sør-Afrika (SANParks). Som med alle nasjonalparker i Sør-Afrika, er det daglige konserverings- og inngangsavgifter for parken. Det kan også være gunstig å kjøpe et Wild Card (en billett), som gir adgang til enten et utvalg av parker, eller alle nasjonalparkene i Sør-Afrika.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa, bordering Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River to the south. The park is 19,500 km² and can be divided into 14 different ecozones, which support different wildlife. This is one of the most popular attractions in South Africa and is considered the most beautiful national park in South Africa (SANParks). As with all national parks in South Africa, there are daily conservation and entrance fees for the park. It may also be beneficial to buy a Wild Card (a ticket), which gives access to either a selection of parks, or all national parks in South Africa.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Det bratte fjellet ruver over nordenden av Machu Picchu og er ofte bakgrunnen for fotografier av ruinene. Det ser fryktelig ut nedenfra og det er en bratt og problematisk oppstigning, men en forholdsvis sprek person bør klare det på rundt 45 minutter. Steintrinn er lagt langs mesteparten av veien, og i de brattere delene gir stålkabler et støttende håndrekkverk. Når det er sagt så kan du forberede deg på å bli tungpustet, bare vær varsom i de brattere delene, særlig når det er vått for da kan det raskt bli farlig. Det er en knøttliten hule nær toppen som man må komme gjennom, den er ganske lav og trang å klemme seg gjennom.
mt: The steep mountain looms over the northern end of Machu Picchu and is often the background for photographs of the ruins. It looks terrible from below and is a steep and difficult climb, but a reasonably fit person should be able to do it in around 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the way, and in the steeper parts give a supporting handrail. When it is said so you can prepare yourself to be out of breath, just be careful in the steeper parts, especially when it is wet as it can quickly become dangerous. There is a small cave near the top that you have to go through, it is quite low and narrow to squeeze through.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Matretter på Mallorca, som i likhet med lignende områder i Middelhavet, er basert på brød, grønnsaker og kjøtt (spesielt flesk), og benytter olivenolje til alt. En lett og godt likt middag, i hvert fall på sommeren, er Pa amb Oli: Skive med olivenolje, tomat og eventuelle tilbehør som ost, tunfisk osv.
mt: Meals on Mallorca, like those in similar areas in the Mediterranean, are based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and use olive oil for everything. A light and tasty dinner, at least in the summer, is Pa amb Oli: Slice with olive oil, tomato and optional accompaniments such as cheese, tuna etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Måltidet Hangi blir laget i et varmt hull i bakken. Gropen er enten oppvarmet med varme steiner fra et bål, mens andre steder har geotermisk varme som gjør områder i bakken naturlig varme. Hangien bruker man ofte i tilberedningen av en tradisjonell stekmiddag. Mange områder i Rotorua kan by på geotermisk hangi, mens andre typer hangi kan forsøkes i Christchurch, Wellington osv.
mt: The Hangi meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, while other places have geothermal heat that makes areas of the ground naturally hot. Hangi is often used in the preparation of a traditional roast dinner. Many areas in Rotorua can provide geothermal hangi, while other types of hangi can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington etc.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Når de er på besøk i klostre, er kvinner pålagt å gå i skjørt som dekker knærne og skuldrene. De fleste klostre tilbyr sjal til kvinner som kommer uforberedt, men tar du med ditt eget og spesielt hvis det har lyse farger, vil du få et smil av munken eller nonnen ved inngangen. Langs samme linje er menn pålagt å ha på seg bukse som går over knærne. Dette kan også være lånt fra lageret ved inngangen, men klærne er kanskje ikke vasket etter hver bruker, så det kan være mindre komfortabelt å gå i disse skjørtene. En størrelse for alle!
mt: When visiting monasteries, women are required to wear skirts that cover the knees and shoulders. Most monasteries offer shawls to women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own and especially if it has bright colors, you will get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear pants that go over the knees. This can also be borrowed from the store at the entrance, but the clothes may not be washed after each user, so it may be less comfortable to wear these skirts. One size fits all!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Dersom du besøker Arktis eller antarktiske områder om vinteren får du oppleve polarnatten, denne tiden stiger ikke solen over horisonten. Dette er en god mulighet til å oppdage Aurora Borealis, ettersom himmelen forblir mørk mer eller mindre døgnet rundt. Ettersom stedene er sparsomt befolket og lysforurensning sjeldent er et problem, vil du også ha mulighet til å se stjernene.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic regions in winter, you may experience polar night, when the sun does not rise above the horizon. This is a good opportunity to observe the Aurora Borealis, as the sky remains dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated and light pollution is rare, you will also have the opportunity to see the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: På avsidesliggende steder med mangel på mobildekning kan satellittelefoner være ditt eneste alternativ. En satellittelefon kan som regel ikke erstatte en mobiltelefon, da man må være utenfor med klar siktlinje til satellitten for å kunne ta en telefon. Tjenesten brukes ofte av skip, fritidsbåter og i tillegg på ekspedisjoner som har fjerndata og kontaktbehov. Du kan få mer informasjon om tilkobling til denne tjenesten hos din lokale telefontjenesteleverandør.
mt: In remote areas with poor mobile coverage, satellite phones can be your only option. A satellite phone can usually not replace a mobile phone, as you must be outside with a clear line of sight to the satellite for a call to be made. The service is often used by ships, yachts and expeditions that have limited data and contact needs. You can get more information about connecting to this service from your local telephone service provider.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

Tjenesten brukes ofte av skip, fritidsbåter og i tillegg på ekspedisjoner som har fjerndata og kontaktbehov. Du kan få mer informasjon om tilkobling til denne tjenesten hos din lokale telefontjenesteleverandør.
mt: In remote areas with poor mobile coverage, satellite phones can be your only option. A satellite phone can usually not replace a mobile phone, as you must be outside with a clear line of sight to the satellite for a call to be made. The service is often used by ships, yachts and expeditions that have limited data and contact needs. You can get more information about connecting to this service from your local telephone service provider.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Chişinău er hovedstaden i Moldova. Rumensk er lokalspråket, men russisk er også mye brukt. Den multietniske republikken Moldova har lidd av etniske konflikter. I 1994 førte denne konflikten til opprettelsen av den selvutnevnte republikken Transnistria i Øst-Moldova, den har sin egen regjering og valuta, men den har ikke blitt anerkjent av noen av FNs medlemsland. Økonomiske forbindelser har blitt gjenopprettet mellom disse to delene av Moldova, til tross for fiaskoen i de politiske forhandlingene. Hovedreligionen i Moldova er ortodoks kristendom.
mt: Chişinău is the capital of Moldova. Romanian is the local language, but Russian is also widely used. The multiethnic republic of Moldova has suffered ethnic conflicts. In 1994 this conflict led to the establishment of the self-proclaimed republic of Transnistria in Eastern Moldova, it has its own government and currency, but it has not been recognized by any of the UN member states. Economic relations have been restored between these two parts of Moldova, despite the failure of the political negotiations. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Ettersom Montevideo er sør for ekvator så er det sommer der mens det er vinter i den nordlige delen på planeten og motsatt. Montevideo ligger i undertropiske strøk; i sommermånedene er temperaturene over +30°C vanlig. Kulden kan være misvisende om vinteren ettersom temperaturen sjelden går under frysepunktet, men en kombinasjon av vind og fuktighet får det til å føles kaldere enn det termometeret viser. Det er ikke noe særlig «regntid» og «tørre» årstider:-regnmengden er lik gjennom hele året.
mt: Since Montevideo is south of the equator, it is summer there while it is winter in the northern part of the planet and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in summer months temperatures are over +30°C. The cold can be misleading in winter since temperatures rarely go below freezing point, but a combination of wind and humidity makes it feel colder than the thermometer shows. There is no particular "rainy season" and "dry" seasons: rainfall is the same throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Uønskede veggmalerier og skriblinger er kjent som graffiti. På tross av at det ikke er et moderne fenomen, vil de fleste trolig forbinde det med ungdomshærverk på offentlig og privat eiendom ved bruk av spraylakk. Nå om dagen finnes det derimot etablerte graffitiartister, graffitiarrangementer og «lovlige» vegger. Graffiti i denne sammenhengen ser ofte ut som kunst i stedet for rabling som ikke kan leses.
mt: Unwanted wall paintings and writings are known as graffiti. Despite the fact that it is not a modern phenomenon, most people will likely associate it with youth vandalism on public and private property using spray paint. However, there are now established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti in this context often looks like art instead of illegible scribbling.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: På noen festivaler bestemmer det store flertallet av festivalvaktene seg for å slå leir på stedet, og de fleste vaktene anser det som en vesentlig del av opplevelsen. Hvis du ønsker å være i nærheten av der det skjer, må du komme tidlig for å få en campingplass tett på musikken. Husk at det kan være deler av festivalen som vil fortsette å spille musikk til sent på natten selv om musikken på hovedscenen er ferdig. På noen festivaler er det spesielle campingområder for småbarnsfamilier.
mt: At some festivals, the majority of festival security staff decide to camp on site, and most security staff consider it an essential part of the experience. If you want to be near where it's happening, you need to come early to get a camping spot close to the music. Remember that there may be parts of the festival that will continue to play music until late at night even though the music on the main stage is over. At some festivals, there are special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Man vil ikke kunne finne en betydelig mengde natteliv uten å reise til Albuquerque eller Santa Fe, med tanke på hvor langt unna folkelivet mange av pueblosene ligger. De fleste kasinoene på listen over serverer likevel drikkevarer, og flere av dem bruker kjente underholdningskrefter (først og fremst de store som ligger i umiddelbar nærhet til Albuquerque og Santa Fe). Vær forsiktig: Småbybarer her er ikke alltid de beste stedene for besøkende fra andre stater å gå ut på. Nord i New Mexico er det et betydelig problem med fyllekjøring, og det er et stort antall berusede bilførere nær småbybarer.
mt: You won't find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe, considering how far away from the mainstream nightlife many of the pueblos are. Most of the casinos on the list do serve alcohol, and several of them use well-known entertainment forces (mostly the larger ones that are in close proximity to Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Be careful: Small-town bars here are not always the best places for visitors from other states to go out. There is a significant problem with drunk driving in the north of New Mexico, and there are a lot of drunk drivers near small-town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Det viktigste lokale ølet er «Nummer en», som ikke er et komplekst men behagelig og forfriskende øl. Det andre lokale ølet heter «Manta». Det er mange franske viner som bør testes, men vin fra New Zealand og Australia kan kanskje reise bedre. Det lokale vannet fra springen er helt trygt å drikke, men dersom du bekymrer deg så er flaskevann lett å finne. For folk fra Australia er ideen om «flat hvit» kaffe utenlandsk. En kort svart er «espresso», cappuccino kommer med fløte (ikke skum), og te serveres uten melk. Kakaoen lever opp til belgisk standard. Fruktjuicen er dyr, men fantastiske.
mt: The most important local beer is "Number One", which is not a complex but pleasant and refreshing beer. The second local beer is called "Manta". There are many French wines that should be tested, but wine from New Zealand and Australia may travel better. The local water from the spring is completely safe to drink, but if you worry so bottle water is easy to find. For people from Australia the idea of "flat white" coffee is foreign. A short black is "espresso", cappuccino comes with cream (not foam), and tea is served without milk. Cocoa lives up to Belgian standards. Fruit juice is expensive, but fantastic.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Den mest betydningsfulle innfødte gruppen i det som nå er det østlige Paraguay var Guaraní-gruppen, de var halvnomadiske jegere, men landbruk var også levebrødet deres. Chaco-området var hjemmet til andre urbefolkningsgrupper som guaycurú og payaguá, som overlevde ved jakt, innsamling og fiske. På 1500-tallet ble Paraguay, som før het «The Giant Provins of the Indies», et land som resultat av møtet med spanske erobrere med de innfødte. Koloniseringsperioden som varte i 3 århundrer ble startet av spanjolene. Siden Asunción ble grunnlagt i 1537, har Paraguay greid å holde på mye av dens steds egne karakter og identitet.
mt: The most important indigenous group in what is now eastern Paraguay was the Guaraní group, they were semi-nomadic hunters, but agriculture was also their livelihood. The Chaco area was the home of other indigenous groups such as guaycurú and payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, which was then called "The Giant Provins of the Indies", became a country as a result of the meeting with Spanish conquerors and the indigenous. The colonization period which lasted for three centuries was started by the Spaniards. Since Asunción was founded in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep much of its own character and identity.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Ryktet til parisere er at de er egosentrisk, frekk og arrogant. Selv om det ofte bare er en unøyaktig stereotypi, er den beste måten å komme langt i Paris på fortsatt å oppføre seg best mulig, oppfører seg som en som er «bien élevé» (godt oppdraget). Det vil gjøre det betraktelig enklere å komme seg rundt. Parisernes raske fasade forsvinner raskt hvis du viser litt grunnleggende høflighet.
mt: Parisians are reputed to be egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often just an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get far in Paris is still to behave as best as possible, acting as someone who is «bien élevé» (well brought up). This will make it considerably easier to get around. Parisians' quick facade disappears quickly if you show a little basic politeness.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail har to klasser pendlertog i, og rundt Cape Town: MetroPlus (kalles også førsteklasse) og Metro (kalt tredjeklasse). MetroPlus er mer behagelig og mindre folksomt. Det er litt mer kostbart, men likevel rimeligere enn vanlige metrobilletter i Europa. Hvert tog har både MetroPlus- og Metro-hjelpere; MetroPlus-hjelperne er alltid på enden av toget som er nærmest Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail has two classes of commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called first class) and Metro (called third class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded. It is a bit more expensive, but still cheaper than regular metro tickets in Europe. Each train has both MetroPlus and Metro attendants; MetroPlus attendants are always at the end of the train that is closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Reisende kan komme over smittsomme dyresykdommer som de ikke kjenner fra sine hjemlige områder. Skadedyr kan forderve mat, føre til irritasjoner, eller i verste fall føre til allergiske reaksjoner, spre giftstoffer eller videreføre infeksjoner. Selve infeksjonssykdommer, eller farefulle dyr som er i stand til å skade eller drepe mennesker med kraften sin, er som regel ikke kvalifisert som pest.
mt: Travelers can bring home infectious diseases that they are not familiar with from their home areas. Pests can contaminate food, cause irritation, or in the worst case cause allergic reactions, spread toxins or propagate infections. The actual infections, or dangerous animals that are capable of harming or killing people with their strength, are usually not qualified as pest.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Hver eneste småbutikk er full av et forvirrende utvalg av forhåndspåfylte kontantkort som kan brukes på telefonautomater og vanlige telefoner. Mens de fleste kort kan brukes til å ringe hvor som helst, tilbyr noen kort gunstige ringepriser til bestemte land. Disse tjenestene er vanligvis tilgjengelig fra et gratisnummer som kan ringes uten kostnad fra de fleste telefoner.
mt: Every convenience store is full of a bewildering array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used on pay phones and regular phones. While most cards can be used to call anywhere, some cards offer discounted rates to certain countries. These services are usually available from a toll-free number that can be called without charge from most phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Plitvice Lakes nasjonalpark er dekket av mye skog, hovedsakelig av bøk, granskog og gran trær, og kjennetegnes av en blanding av høyfjell og middelhavsvegetasjon. Den har en spesielt stor variasjon av plantesamfunn, på grunn av sin rekkevidde av mikroklima, forskjellig jord og varierende nivåer av høyde. Området huser også svært mange dyr og fuglearter. Der finner man sjelden fauna som europeisk brunbjørn, ulv, ørn, ugler, gaupe, villkatt og tiur, i lag med flere alminnelige dyrearter.
mt: Plitvice Lakes National Park is covered by much forest, mainly beech, oak and pine trees, and is characterized by a mixture of alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. The area has a particularly large variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, different soil and varying altitudes. The area also hosts very many animal and bird species. Rare fauna include European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, chamois, wildcat and marmot, along with several common animal species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Plitvice Lakes nasjonalpark er dekket av mye skog, hovedsakelig av bøk, granskog og gran trær, og kjennetegnes av en blanding av høyfjell og middelhavsvegetasjon. Den har en spesielt stor variasjon av plantesamfunn, på grunn av sin rekkevidde av mikroklima, forskjellig jord og varierende nivåer av høyde. Området huser også svært mange dyr og fuglearter. Der finner man sjelden fauna som europeisk brunbjørn, ulv, ørn, ugler, gaupe, villkatt og tiur, i lag med flere alminnelige dyrearter.
mt: Plitvice Lakes National Park is covered by much forest, mainly beech, oak and pine trees, and is characterized by a mixture of alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. The area has a particularly large variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, different soil and varying altitudes. The area also hosts very many animal and bird species. Rare fauna include European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, chamois, wildcat and marmot, along with several common animal species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Mediebedriftene lyver konsekvent om formålet med dette og hevder at det er for å «forebygge piratkopiering». Regionkoder har absolutt ingen effekt på ulovlig kopiering, en nøyaktig kopi av en disk vil spille helt fint på en hvilken som helst enhet der originalen kan spilles av. Formålet er å gi selskapene mer kontroll over markedene sine, det handler om å tjene mye penger.
mt: Media companies lie consistently about the purpose of this and claim it is to "prevent piracy". Region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying, an exact copy of a disc will play just fine on any device that the original can be played on. The purpose is to give companies more control over their markets, it's about making a lot of money.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Selv om innvandringskontrollen som regel er fraværende eller en formalitet når du kommer tilbake til ditt hjemland, kan tollkontroll være plagsomt. Vær sikker på hva du kan ta med og ikke, og pass på at du oppgir alt som overstiger lovlig grense.
mt: While immigration control is usually absent or a formality when returning to your home country, customs control can be annoying. Be sure of what you can take with you and not, and be careful to declare everything that exceeds legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Den største klatredestinasjon i Chile, Cochamó Valley, er kjent som Sør-Amerikas Yosemite, med mange store vegger og knauser i granitt. Toppklatringen byr på slående utsikt fra fjelltoppene. Klatrere fra hele verden lager seg stadig nye ruter i de uendelige havene av fjellvegger.
mt: The largest climbing destination in Chile, Cochamó Valley, is known as South America's Yosemite, with many large walls and cracks in granite. Top climbing offers stunning views from the mountain tops. Climbers from all over the world are making new routes in the endless seas of mountain walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Hvis du ønsker å fly rundt verden fullstendig på den sørlige halvkulen, er valget av flyvninger og destinasjoner begrenset på grunn av mangelen på transoceaniske ruter. Ingen flyforbund dekker alle tre havkryssinger på den sørlige halvkulen (og SkyTeam dekker ingen av krysningene). Star Alliance dekker derimot alt med unntak av det østlige Sør-Stillehavet fra Santiago de Chile til Tahiti, som er en LATAM Oneworld-flyvning. Hvis du vil unngå Sør-Stillehavet og vestkysten av Sør-Amerika så er det også andre flyalternativer (se under).
mt: If you want to fly around the world completely on the southern hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings on the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). Star Alliance does cover everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. If you want to avoid South Pacific and the west coast of South America, there are also other flight alternatives (see below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Globalt er det nesten 200 turorganisasjoner. De fleste driver selvstendig. Global Running Tours etterfølger, Go Running Tours har et nettverk av mange sightrunningleverandører på fire kontinenter. Med røtter i Running Tours Barcelona fra Barcelona og Running Tours Copenhagen fra København fikk det raskt selskap av Running Tours Prague fra Praha og andre.
mt: 200+ running tour companies exist globally. Most are independent. Global Running Tours follows, Go Running Tours has a network of many sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Running Tours Barcelona from Barcelona and Running Tours Copenhagen from Copenhagen, it quickly gained company from Running Tours Prague from Prague and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: Safari er kanskje den største formen for turisme som trekker turister til Afrika og er hovedpunktet for mange besøkende. Uttrykket safari i folkelig omtale betegner reiser til land for å se det flotte afrikanske dyrelivet, spesifikt på savannen. Noen dyr, som for eksempel elefanter og sjiraffer, liker å nærme seg biler og standardutstyr, noe som vil tillate gode synsvinkler. Løver, geparder og leoparder kan være ganske sky og du ser dem bedre med kikkert. En vandringssafari (også kalt en «buskvandring», eller «balansevandring») innebærer at man går på tur, i enten noen timer eller i flere dager.
mt: Safari is probably the largest form of tourism that draws tourists to Africa and is the main point of many visitors. The term safari in popular parlance refers to trips to the country to see the beautiful African wildlife, specifically on the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, like to approach cars and standard equipment, which will allow good viewing angles. Lions, cheetahs and leopards can be quite shy and you see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a "bush walk" or "balance walk") involves walking on a tour, either for several hours or for several days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Turene er billigere for større grupper, så hvis du er alene eller kun med én venn, prøv å møte flere folk for å lage en gruppe på fire til seks. Dette kan gi bedre pris per person. Dette bør imidlertid ikke være noe du bekymrer deg for, siden turister ofte blir stokket rundt for å fylle bilene. Det ser ut til at det heller er en måte å lure mennesker på, til få dem til å tro at de må betale mer penger.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you are alone or just with one friend, try to meet more people to make a group of four to six. This can give better price per person. This should however not be something you worry about, since tourists are often herded around to fill the buses. It seems to be a way to trick people into thinking they have to pay more money.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Selv om San Franciscos finansielle stilling er tilknyttet det å være en turistattraksjon i verdensklasse, så er økonomien mangfoldig. De største arbeidssektorene er tjenester i forskjellige fag, offentlige tjenester, økonomi, handel og turisme. Byens hyppige fremstilling i musikk, film, litteratur og popkultur har bidratt til at byen og landemerkene der har blitt kjent verden over. San Francisco har skapt en større infrastruktur for turisme med tallrike hoteller, restauranter og førsteklasses konvensjonsanlegg. Asiatisk, koreansk, thai, indisk og japansk mat kan man også finne i San Francisco, som er et av landets beste områder for asiatisk mat.
mt: San Francisco's economy is primarily based on tourism, and the city is a tourist attraction in the world class. The largest employment sectors are services in various fields, public services, economy, trade and tourism. The city's frequent portrayal in music, film, literature and pop culture has contributed to the city and landmarks being known worldwide. San Francisco has created a larger infrastructure for tourism with numerous hotels, restaurants and first-class convention centers. Asian, Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese food can also be found in San Francisco, which is one of the country's best areas for Asian food.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Booking i forkant gir den veifarende fred i tankene siden de nå har et sted å sove når de ankommer deres reisemål. Reisebyråer har ofte avtaler med spesifikke hoteller, skjønt det kan være muligheter for å booke losji i andre områder, som for eksempel på en campingplass, gjennom et reisebyrå. Reisebyråene selger som oftest pakkeløsninger med inkludert frokost, transport til og fra flyplassen eller til og med pakkekombinasjoner med fly og hotell. De kan også reservere et sete for deg hvis du trenger tid til å tenke på et tilbud eller få andre dokumenter for avtalen din (for eksempel visum). Diverse forandringer eller forespørsler bør foretas via reiseagenten først og ikke direkte med hotellet.
mt: Booking in advance gives the traveling peace of mind since they now have a place to sleep when they arrive at their destination. Travel agencies often have agreements with specific hotels, although there may be opportunities to stay in other areas, such as on a campsite, through a travel agency. Travel agencies usually sell package solutions with breakfast included, transport to and from the airport or even package combinations with flights and hotels. They can also reserve a seat for you if you need time to think about an offer or get other documents for your agreement (for example, visa). Various changes or requests should be made through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Apper som oversetter tekst i sanntid – apper som automatisk kan oversette hele tekstsegmenter fra ett språk til et annet. Noen av programmene av denne typen klarer også å oversette tekst fra skilt eller andre gjenstander i den virkelige verden fra fremmedspråk når brukeren retter smarttelefonen mot gjenstandene. Oversettelsesmotorene har bedret seg dramatisk, og kommer ofte mer eller mindre med korrekte oversettelser (og sjeldnere vrøvl), men noe forsiktighet må brukes siden de fortsatt kan komme med feil. En av appene som skiller seg mest ut i denne kategorien er Google Translate, som gjør det mulig å oversette uten internett etter å ha lastet ned data for ønsket språk.
mt: Apps that translate text in real time – apps that can automatically translate entire text segments from one language to another. Some of these programs can also translate text from signs or other objects in the real world from foreign languages when the user points their smartphone at the objects. Translation engines have improved dramatically, and often come with more or less correct translations (and sometimes nonsense), but some caution should be used since they can still come with errors. One of the apps that stands out in this category is Google Translate, which allows you to translate without internet after downloading data for the desired language.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Snøskred er ikke en unormalitet. Bratte skråninger kan kun holde en viss mengde med snø og de overflødige massene vil komme ned som snøskred. Problemet er at snøen er kram, så for at snøen skal komme ned må den utløses, og når noe av snøen begynner å kommer nedover, kan den være med på å utløse resten. Noen ganger er den opprinnelige utløserhendelsen at sola varmer opp snøen, noen ganger litt mer snøfall, noen ganger også andre naturhendelser, ofte et menneske.
mt: Avalanche is not an uncommon event. Steep slopes can only hold a certain amount of snow and the excess will come down as avalanches. The problem is that the snow is compact, so for the snow to come down it has to be triggered, and once some of the snow starts coming down the slope, it may trigger the rest. Sometimes the original trigger is the sun warming up the snow, sometimes a little more snowfall, sometimes also other natural events, often a human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Snøskred er ikke en unormalitet. Bratte skråninger kan kun holde en viss mengde med snø og de overflødige massene vil komme ned som snøskred. Problemet er at snøen er kram, så for at snøen skal komme ned må den utløses, og når noe av snøen begynner å kommer nedover, kan den være med på å utløse resten. Noen ganger er den opprinnelige utløserhendelsen at sola varmer opp snøen, noen ganger litt mer snøfall, noen ganger også andre naturhendelser, ofte et menneske.
mt: Avalanche is not an uncommon event. Steep slopes can only hold a certain amount of snow and the excess will come down as avalanches. The problem is that the snow is compact, so for the snow to come down it has to be triggered, and once some of the snow starts coming down the slope, it may trigger the rest. Sometimes the original trigger is the sun warming up the snow, sometimes a little more snowfall, sometimes also other natural events, often a human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: En karrirett er basert på urter og krydder, blandet med enten kjøtt eller grønnsaker. Avhengig av mengden væske man har i, kan en karrirett enten være tørr, eller fuktig. I innlandsregioner i Nord-India og Pakistan er yoghurt regelmessig benyttet i karriretter, mens det er vanlig å bruke kokosmelk i Sør-India og noen andre kystregioner på subkontinentet.
mt: A curry is based on herbs and spices, mixed with either meat or vegetables. Depending on the amount of liquid one has, a curry can either be dry, or wet. In the inland regions of North India and Pakistan, yogurt is regularly used in curries, while it is common to use coconut milk in South India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Sydpol-traverset (eller hovedveien) er et spor på 1600 km fra McMurdo Station ved Ross-sjøen til polen. Det er kompakt snø og fylte bresprekker som er markert med flagg. Den eneste måten å ferdes på er med spesialtraktor og transportsleder med drivstoff og forsyninger. Ettersom de ikke er spesielt spreke, må sporet ta en lang sving rundt de transantarktiske fjellene for å komme opp på platået.
mt: 1600 km South Pole Traverse (or main route) is a track from McMurdo Station at Ross Sea to the pole. It is compact snow and filled crevasses marked with flags. The only way to travel is with special tractor and sled with fuel and supplies. Since they are not very slippery, the track takes a long detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to get up on the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Å kjøre inn i Sørafrika med bil er en fantastisk måte å se hele områdets skjønnhet så vel som å komme seg til steder utenfor de vanlige turistrutene. Dette kan gjøres i en vanlig bil med forsiktig planlegging, men en 4x4 er sterkt anbefalt og mange steder er bare tilrettelagt for høye 4x4. Ha i tankene mens du legger planer om at selv om Sør-Afrika er stabilt, er ikke det tilfellet for alle nabolandene. Krav til visum og priser er forskjellig fra land til land og er avhengig av det landet du kommer fra. Hvert land har også unike lover som avgjør hvilket nødutstyr som er påkrevd å være i bilen.
mt: Driving into South Africa with a car is a fantastic way to see the whole country's beauty as well as getting to places off the beaten track. This can be done in a regular car with careful planning, but a 4x4 is highly recommended and many places are only accessible by high 4x4s. Keep in mind while you plan that although South Africa is stable, this is not the case for all neighbouring countries. Requirements for visas and prices vary from country to country and are dependent on the country you are coming from. Each country also has unique laws that dictate what emergency equipment is required to be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Bære for andre – Aldri la bagasjen slippe ut av syne, spesielt når du krysser internasjonale grenser. Man kan bli brukt som transportør av narkotika uten å vite om det, noe som vil lage en stor del problemer. Dette inkluderer venting i kø, der narkotikahunder kan bli brukt uten varsel når som helst. Noen land har overdrevent strenge straffer selv for første gangs forseelser, som kan innebære fengselsstraffer på over ti år eller død. Ubevoktet bagasje tiltrekker seg tyver, og kan også tiltrekke seg oppmerksomhet fra personale som er på utkikk etter bombetrusler.
mt: Carry for others – Never let your luggage out of sight, especially when crossing international borders. You can be used as a carrier of narcotics without knowing it, which will create a large amount of problems. This includes waiting in line, where drug dogs can be used without warning at any time. Some countries have overly strict punishments even for first-time offenses, which can include prison sentences of over ten years or death. Unattended luggage attracts thieves, and can also attract attention from staff who are looking for bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Fyll ditt hjem med en smaksrik kaffe på morgenen og litt beroligende kamillete på kvelden. Når du er på hjemmeferie får du tid til å ta vare på deg selv og bruke litt ekstra tid på å brygge noe spesielt. Dersom du har mer lyst til å prøve noe nytt, kan du bruke muligheten til å juice eller blende noen smoothier: kanskje finner du en enkel drink som du kan lage til frokost når du er tilbake til daglig rutine. Dersom du er bosatt i en by med forskjellige normer rundt drikke, bør du forsøke barer eller puber i nabolag der du sjelden befinner deg.
mt: Fill your home with a flavorful coffee in the morning and a little calming camomile tea in the evening. When you are on vacation you have time to take care of yourself and spend a little extra time brewing something special. If you are more interested in trying something new, you can use the opportunity to juice or blend some smoothies: maybe you will find a simple drink that you can make for breakfast when you are back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with different norms around drinking, you should try bars or pubs in neighborhoods where you rarely find yourself.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Man se øya Eysturoy fra landsbyen Haldarsvík som også har en uvanlig åttekantet kirke. Det er fabelaktige marmorskulpturer av duer på noen av gravene i kirkegården. Det er verdt å benytte en halvtime på å rusle i den spennende landsbyen.
mt: Man can see the island of Eysturoy from the village of Haldarsvík, which also has an unusual octagonal church. There are fabulous marble sculptures of doves on some of the graves in the churchyard. It is worth spending half an hour wandering around the exciting village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Du trenger kanskje ikke visum for korte besøk som turist eller i forbindelse med forretninger i enkelte land, men som utenlandsstudent må du som regel oppholde deg der i lengre tid enn en turist. Generelt vil det kreves at du skaffer visum på forhånd hvis du skal oppholde deg i utlandet over en lengre periode. Generelt har studentvisum ulike krav og søknadsprosedyrer fra vanlige turist- eller forretningsvisum. For de fleste nasjoner vil du behøve et tilbudsbrev fra institusjonen du har lyst til å studere ved, i tillegg til bevis på midler som viser at du kan forsørge deg selv i hvert fall gjennom det 1. året av kurset ditt. Sjekk med skolen, i tillegg til immigrasjonsmyndighetene i det landet du ønsker å studere, for å få kunnskap om detaljerte krav.
mt: You may not need a visa for short visits as a tourist or in connection with business in some countries, but as an international student you will usually have to stay there for a longer period than a tourist. Generally, you will need to obtain a visa in advance if you are going to stay abroad for a longer period. Generally, student visas have different requirements and application procedures from ordinary tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, in addition to proof of funds showing that you can support yourself at least for the first year of your course. Check with the school, in addition to the immigration authorities in the country you wish to study, for detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Spesielt om sommeren må du være forsiktig med tanke på mygg hvis du finner ut at du vil gå tur gjennom regnskogen. Selv om du kjører gjennom den subtropiske regnskogen, så er noen sekunder med dørene åpne nok tid til at mygg kommer i kjøretøyet sammen med deg.
mt: Especially in the summer, you should be careful about mosquitoes if you find out that you will go for a walk through the rainforest. Even if you drive through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open is enough time for mosquitoes to get into the vehicle with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Den største strandsonen på planeten er Sundarbans, som er på 80 kilometer (50 mi) innover i Bangladesh og det indiske innlandet fra kysten. Sundarbans har blitt erklært på UNESCOs verdensarvliste. Den delen av skogen som er innenfor det indiske territoriet heter Sundarbans nasjonalpark. Skogene er ikke bare mangrovesumper – her finnes noen av de siste gjenværende områdene med jungel, som en gang dekket de gigantiske slettene. Sundarbans består av et område på 3 850 km² med ca. en tredjedel av området dekket av vann og myr. Sundarbans har vært et naturreservat siden 1966, og det er anslått at det nå er 400 bengaltigre og rundt 30 000 aksishjort i området.
mt: The largest coastal region on Earth is Sundarbans, which is 80 kilometers (50 mi) inland in Bangladesh and the Indian mainland from the coast. Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within the Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests are not just mangrove swamps – here are some of the last remaining areas of jungle, which once covered the vast plains. Sundarbans consists of an area of 3,850 km² with about a third of the area covered by water and marsh. Sundarbans has been a nature reserve since 1966, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Bengal tigers and about 30,000 chital deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Det finnes mer enn 5000 ulike språk globalt, og mer enn tjue av de har 50 millioner eller flere talende. De skrevne ordene er ofte lettere å forstå enn de som snakkes. Spesielt adresser, som ofte er vanskelig å uttale korrekt. I mange land snakker hele befolkningen flytende engelsk, og i enda flere land har spesielt de yngre en begrenset engelskkunnskap. Se for deg en person fra Manchester, en fra Boston, en fra Jamaica og en fra Sydney som alle sitter rundt et bord og spiser middag på en restaurant i Toronto. De underholder hverandre med historier fra hjembyene sine, fortalt med sine distinkte dialekter og lokale skikker.
mt: There are more than 5000 languages worldwide, and more than twenty of them have 50 million or more speakers. The written words are often easier to understand than the spoken ones. Especially addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce correctly. In many countries, everyone speaks fluent English, and in even more countries, especially the younger ones, have a limited English knowledge. See for yourself a person from Manchester, one from Boston, one from Jamaica and one from Sydney who all sit around a table and eat dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They entertain each other with stories from their hometowns, told with their distinct dialects and local customs.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Det finnes mer enn 5000 ulike språk globalt, og mer enn tjue av de har 50 millioner eller flere talende. De skrevne ordene er ofte lettere å forstå enn de som snakkes. Spesielt adresser, som ofte er vanskelig å uttale korrekt. I mange land snakker hele befolkningen flytende engelsk, og i enda flere land har spesielt de yngre en begrenset engelskkunnskap. Se for deg en person fra Manchester, en fra Boston, en fra Jamaica og en fra Sydney som alle sitter rundt et bord og spiser middag på en restaurant i Toronto. De underholder hverandre med historier fra hjembyene sine, fortalt med sine distinkte dialekter og lokale skikker.
mt: There are more than 5000 languages worldwide, and more than twenty of them have 50 million or more speakers. The written words are often easier to understand than the spoken ones. Especially addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce correctly. In many countries, everyone speaks fluent English, and in even more countries, especially the younger ones, have a limited English knowledge. See for yourself a person from Manchester, one from Boston, one from Jamaica and one from Sydney who all sit around a table and eat dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They entertain each other with stories from their hometowns, told with their distinct dialects and local customs.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Busser kjører fra bussterminalen (over elven) gjennom hele dagen, på tross av at de fleste, særlig de bussene som går østover og til Jakar/Bumthang, reiser mellom 06:30 og 07:30. Siden distriktsbussene ofte er overfylte, anbefales det å kjøpe en billett flere dager i forveien. Små japanske kystbusser som både er komfortable og solide, betjener de fleste distriktene. Delte taxier er en rask og komfortabel måte å reise til steder i nærheten som for eksempel Paro (Nu 150) og Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Buses run from the bus terminal (across the river) all day, despite most, especially those going east and to Jakar/Bumthang, traveling between 06:30 and 07:30. Since district buses are often overcrowded, it is recommended to buy a ticket several days in advance. Small Japanese coastal buses that are both comfortable and sturdy, serve most districts. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable way to travel to places nearby such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: «Timbuktu» har blitt brukt som en metafor for eksotiske, fjerne land, kombinert med relativ utilgjengelighet. Selv om Timbuktu har sin egen flyplass og dens renommé har gjort byen til en turistattraksjon, er det en veldig fattig by. På grunn av trusselen fra ørkensanden ble den i 1990 lagt til listen over verdensarvsteder som står i fare. Det var et av de store stoppene under Henry Louis Gates' PBS-spesial Wonders of the African World. Byen står i sterk kontrast til byene i resten av landet, fordi den har et mer arabisk enn afrikansk preg.
mt: "Timbuktu" has been used as a metaphor for exotic, faraway lands, combined with relative inaccessibility. Although Timbuktu has its own airport and its reputation has made the city a tourist attraction, it is a very poor city. Due to the threat of desert sand, it was added to the list of World Heritage Sites in danger in 1990. It was one of the major stops in Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city stands in stark contrast to the cities in the rest of the country, because it has a more Arab than African flavor.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."
