src: Paralympics vil være fra 24.08.2021 til 05.09.2021. Noen arrangementer vil holdes andre steder rundt i hele Japan. Tokyo blir den eneste asiatiske byen som har vært vertskap for to sommer-OL. Byen hadde lekene i 1964. Har du bestilt fly og overnatting for 2020 før utsettelsen ble annonsert, kan du slite. Avbestillingsregler varierer, men siden slutten av mars vil ikke avbestillingsreglene utvides til juli 2020, da OL var planlagt. Det er forventet at de fleste aktivitetsbilletter vil koste mellom ¥2500 og ¥130 000, og typiske billetter med priser rundt ¥7000.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held elsewhere around Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics. The city hosted the games in 1964. Have you booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you can fight. Cancellation rules vary, but since the end of March, cancellation rules will not be extended to July 2020, when the Olympics were planned. It is expected that most activity tickets will cost between ¥2500 and ¥130 000, and typical tickets with prices around ¥7000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: En tornado er en roterende søyle med svært lav trykkluft, noe som suger den omkringliggende luften innover og oppover. De genererer kraftige vinder (ofte 160-320 kilometer/time) og kan løfte tunge gjenstander inn i luften, samt frakte dem ettersom tornadoen beveger seg. De starter som trakter som synker fra stormskyer, og blir om til «tornadoer» når de kommer på bakkenivå.
mt: A tornado is a rotating column of air with very low pressure, which sucks in the surrounding air. They generate strong winds (often 160-320 km/h) and can lift heavy objects into the air, and carry them as the tornado moves. They start as funnels that sink from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they reach ground level.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Hvis det blir utstedt reiseråd om det landet du planlegger reise å til, kan det ha innvirkning på reiseforsikringen eller avbestillingsforsikringen din. Det kan hende du også ønsker å rådføre deg med andre myndigheter enn dine egne, men deres råd er beregnet på deres innbyggere. Et eksempel kan være at amerikanske statsborgere i Midtøsten møter på andre situasjoner enn europeere eller arabere. Veilederne er kun korte oppsummeringer av den politiske situasjonen i et land. Visningene som presenteres, er ofte overfladiske, generelle og enkle sammenlignet med den mer detaljerte informasjonen andre steder.
mt: If travel advice is issued for the country you plan to travel to, it may affect your travel insurance or cancellation insurance. You may also want to consult other authorities than your own, but their advice is intended for their citizens. An example is that American citizens in the Middle East meet different situations than Europeans or Arabs. The guides are only brief summaries of the political situation in a country. The presentations are often superficial, general and simple compared to the more detailed information elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Reisebyråer har drevet på siden det 19. århundre. Et reisebyrå er som regel et godt alternativ for en reise som er noe mer enn en reisendes tidligere opplevelse av natur, kultur, språk eller lavinntektsland. De fleste etater er villige til å ta på seg de mest vanlige bookingene, men mange agenter har spesialisert seg på spesielle typer reiser, budsjettområder eller destinasjoner. Det kan være en fordel å heller benytte en agent som ofte bestiller lignende reiser. Sjekk hvilke turer agenten anbefaler, enten på nettsiden eller i butikkvinduet.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agency is usually a good alternative for a trip that is more than a traveler's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Most states are willing to take on the most common bookings, but many agents have specialized in special types of trips, budget areas or destinations. It may be an advantage to use an agent who often orders similar trips. Check which tours the agent recommends, either on the website or in the store window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Når du skal reise et eller annet sted er det mange ting du må ta hensyn til før og under reisen. Du kan ikke regne med at alt skal være som «hjemme» når du er på reise. Manerer, regler, mat, trafikk, losji, standarder, språk osv. vil til en viss grad være annerledes enn der man kommer fra. Dette er noe man alltid trenger å ha i tankene for å unngå skuffelser eller kanskje til og med få en avstand fra lokale måter å gjøre ting på.
mt: When you are traveling somewhere, there are many things you need to consider before and during the trip. You cannot expect everything to be like "home" when you are traveling. Manners, rules, food, traffic, accommodation, standards, language, etc. will to some extent be different from where you come from. This is something you always need to have in mind to avoid disappointments or even distance from local ways of doing things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Dersom det er første gang du reiser til et u-land – eller til en ny del av verden – vær forberedt på et potensielt kultursjokk. Selv mange erfarne, dyktige reisende blir overtatt av alle de nye inntrykkene som kommer fra å reise verden rundt, hvor mange små kulturelle tilpasninger etter hvert kan balle på seg. Du kan tenke på å spandere litt ekstra på hotell, matvarer og tjenester i vestlig stil og kvalitet særlig i begynnelsen for å akklimatisere deg. Ikke sov på en madrass eller et underlag direkte på bakken på steder der du ikke har kjennskap til den lokale fauna. Hvis du skal campe utendørs, ta med deg en leirseng eller hengekøye, for å unngå slanger, skorpioner og den slags.
mt: If this is your first time traveling to a developing country – or to a new part of the world – be prepared for a potential culture shock. Even many experienced, skilled travelers are overwhelmed by all the new impressions that come from traveling around the world, where many small cultural adjustments can pile up over time. You can think about spending a little extra on hotels, food, and services in a Western style and quality especially at the beginning to acclimate yourself. Don't sleep on a mattress or a groundsheet directly on the ground in places where you are not familiar with the local fauna. If you are camping outdoors, bring a sleeping pad or hammock to avoid snakes, scorpions, and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Sørg for å ha med deg kopi av forsikringen din og kontaktinformasjon til forsikringsselskapet. De må vise forsikringsselskapet e-postadresse og internasjonale telefonnummer for råd/godkjenning og fremsetning av krav. Du bør ha med en ekstra kopi i bagasjen din og en på nett (enten e-post til deg selv med vedlegg eller lagret i «skyen»). Dersom du har med en bærbar PC eller nettbrett på reise, bør du oppbevare en kopi i dens minnet eller disk (med tilgang uten nett). Gi også kopier av forsikrings-/kontaktkopier til reisefeller og til slektninger eller venner hjemme som er klare til å hjelpe.
mt: 1. Make sure to have a copy of your insurance policy and contact information to the insurance company. They must show the insurance company e-mail address and international telephone number for advice/authorization and presentation of claims. You should have an extra copy in your luggage and one on the web (either e-mail to yourself with attachments or stored in the «cloud»). If you have a laptop or netbook on your trip, you should store a copy in its memory or disk (with access without net). Also give copies of insurance/contacts to travel funds and to relatives or friends at home who are ready to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Det finnes mange ulike filmformater som har blitt brukt i løpet av årene. Den vanligste er standard 35 mm-film (36 med 24 mm negativ). Går du tom kan den enkelt byttes ut med en ny og den har en oppløsningsevne som stort sett kan sammenlignes med et speilreflekskamera. Noen filmkameraer med middelsformat bruker et 6 ganger 6 cm format, eller mer nøyaktig en 56 ganger 56 mm-negativ. Dette gir oppløsning som er nesten fire ganger så mye som en 35 mm negativ (3136 mm2 mot 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 mm negative) is the most common film format. It can be replaced with a new one and has a resolution that can be compared to a mirror reflex camera. Some medium format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, or more accurately a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives a resolution that is almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 against 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Det finnes mange ulike filmformater som har blitt brukt i løpet av årene. Den vanligste er standard 35 mm-film (36 med 24 mm negativ). Går du tom kan den enkelt byttes ut med en ny og den har en oppløsningsevne som stort sett kan sammenlignes med et speilreflekskamera. Noen filmkameraer med middelsformat bruker et 6 ganger 6 cm format, eller mer nøyaktig en 56 ganger 56 mm-negativ. Dette gir oppløsning som er nesten fire ganger så mye som en 35 mm negativ (3136 mm2 mot 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 mm negative) is the most common film format. It can be replaced with a new one and has a resolution that can be compared to a mirror reflex camera. Some medium format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, or more accurately a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives a resolution that is almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 against 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Det å finpusse ferdighetene dine på et etablert reisebloggnettsted er den enkleste måten å komme i gang med reiseskriving på. Når du har blitt vant til formatering og redigering på internett, så kan du etter hvert lage din egen hjemmeside.
mt: The easiest way to get started with travel writing is to fine-tune your skills on an established travel blog network. Once you get used to formatting and editing on the Internet, you can eventually make your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Det å finpusse ferdighetene dine på et etablert reisebloggnettsted er den enkleste måten å komme i gang med reiseskriving på. Når du har blitt vant til formatering og redigering på internett, så kan du etter hvert lage din egen hjemmeside.
mt: The easiest way to get started with travel writing is to fine-tune your skills on an established travel blog network. Once you get used to formatting and editing on the Internet, you can eventually make your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: På grunn av denne stadige eksponeringen for bakterier hjemme, er sjansen for at du allerede er immun mot dem veldig stor. Mens i andre verdensdeler der du ikke er vandt med bakteriefloraen, er sjansene større for at du vil oppleve problemer. I klima med høyere temperaturer, vokser også bakterier både hyppigere og overlever lenger utenfor kroppen. Derfor ankom Delhi-mage, Faraos forbannelse, Montezumas hevn og deres mange venner. Fordøyelsesproblemer er like vanlige i et varmt klima som pusteproblemer i et kaldt klima. I de fleste tilfellene er det ganske irriterende, men egentlig ikke farlig.
mt: Because of this constant exposure to bacteria at home, the chances are very high that you are already immune to them. While in other parts of the world where you are not exposed to the bacterial flora, the chances are higher that you will experience problems. In climates with higher temperatures, bacteria also grow more frequently and survive longer outside the body. Therefore, Delhi belly, the curse of the Pharaohs, Montezuma's revenge and their many friends. Digestive problems are as common in a warm climate as respiratory problems in a cold climate. In most cases, it is quite annoying, but actually not dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Europa er et ganske lite kontinent, men har mange selvstendige land. Ved vanlige omstendigheter vil en reise gjennom flere nasjoner bety flere visumsøknader og passkontroller. Schengenområdet fungerer derimot omtrent som ett land når det gjelder dette. Så lenge du oppholder deg innenfor denne sonen, kan du generelt sett krysse grenser uten å gjennomgå passkontrollpunkter igjen. Samtidig må du ikke å søke om visum til hvert enkelt Schengen-medlemsland dersom du har et Schengen-visum, og du sparer derfor tid, penger og papirarbeid.
mt: Europe is a small continent, but has many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, a trip through several nations will mean several visa applications and passport checks. The Schengen area, however, works almost like one country in this regard. As long as you stay within this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control again. At the same time, you do not need to apply for a visa to each individual Schengen member state if you have a Schengen visa, and you save time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutankhamon-gravkammeret (KV62). KV62 er kanskje den mest kjente av gravstedene i dalen, stedet hvor Howard Carter i 1922 hadde sin oppdagelse av den nesten intakt kongegraven til den unge kongen. Sammenlignet med de fleste andre kongelige graver, er Tutankhamons grav knapt nok verdt et besøk, ettersom den er mye mindre og utsmykningen er begrenset. Enhver som har lyst til å se bevis på ødeleggelsene som skjedde på mumien under forsøk på å fjerne den fra kisten, vil bli skuffet, da det er bare hodet og skuldrene som er igjen. De fantastiske skattene i gravkammeret er der ikke lenger, men er flyttet til Det egyptiske museet i Kairo. Besøkende med begrenset tid vil nok foretrekke å bruke tiden sin andre steder.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 is perhaps the most famous of the tombs in the valley, the site of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact tomb of the young king. Compared to most other royal tombs, Tutankhamun's tomb is barely worth a visit, as it is much smaller and the decoration is limited. Anyone who wants to see evidence of the damage done to the mummy during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed, as only the head and shoulders remain. The fabulous treasures in the tomb are no longer there, but have been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time will probably prefer to spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Bowen Island er et sted som er populært for dagsturer eller en helgeutflukt, stedet byr på kajakkpadling, turgåing, butikker, restauranter og mer. Dette tradisjonelle samfunnet ligger i Howe Sound rett utenfor Vancouver, og med vanntaxier som går i rute fra Granville Island i sentrum av Vancouver, er det lett tilgjengelig. En tur opp mot Sea to Sky-korridoren er betydningsfull å få med seg for de som setter pris på aktiviteter utendørs. Whistler (ligger 1,5 times kjøring fra Vancouver) er et område med høye priser, men er godt kjent på grunn av vinter-OL i 2010. Om vinteren kan du glede deg over tilgang til de beste skiforholdene i Nord-Amerika. Om sommeren kan du prøve deg på ekte terrengsykling.
mt: Bowen Island is a place that is popular for day trips or a weekend getaway, the place offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants and more. This traditional community is located in Howe Sound just outside Vancouver, and with the ferries that run from Granville Island in the center of Vancouver, it is easily accessible. A trip up to the Sea to Sky corridor is worth seeing for those who appreciate outdoor activities. Whistler (located 1.5 hours driving from Vancouver) is an area with high prices, but is well known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter you can enjoy access to the best ski conditions in North America. In the summer you can try real mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls er en by i den vestlige delen av Zimbabwe, på tvers av grensen fra Livingstone, Zambia og i nærheten av Botswana. Byen ligger rett ved siden av fossen, som er hovedattraksjonen. Men det er mange muligheter for et lengre opphold for både eventyrsøkere og observatører ved denne populære turistdestinasjonen. Både vannvolumet blir høyere og fossen mer dramatisk i regntiden (fra november til mars). Du er garantert å bli våt hvis du krysser brua eller går langs stiene i nærheten av fossen. På den annen side så er det jo nettopp fordi volumet av vann er så høyt at synet ditt på selve fossen blir tildekket – av all vannmengden!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the western part of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia and near Botswana. The town is right next to the falls, which is the main attraction. But there are many opportunities for a longer stay for both adventurers and observers at this popular tourist destination. Both the water volume is higher and the falls more dramatic in the rainy season (from November to March). You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the paths near the falls. On the other hand, it is just because the volume of water is so high that your view of the falls itself is covered – by all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Reglement rundt vanlig fotografering gjelder også for videoopptak. Hvis bare det å ta et bilde av noe ikke er tillatt, da bør du ikke engang tenke på å ta opp en video av det. Hvis du bruker en drone, sjekk i forkant hva du får lov til å filme, og hvilke tillatelser eller ekstra lisensiering som er nødvendig. Det å fly en drone i nærheten av en flyplass eller over en folkemengde er som regel alltid en dårlig idé, selv om det ikke skulle være forbudt akkurat der.
mt: The rules for regular photography also apply to video recordings. If taking a picture of something is not allowed, you should not even think about recording a video of it. If you use a drone, check in advance what you are allowed to film, and what additional licensing or permits are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is usually a bad idea, even if it is not specifically prohibited there.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Registrering er et ekstra krav i prosessen for visum. I noen land må du registrere oppholdet ditt og adresse du befinner deg på hos lokale myndigheter. Dette kan kreve at man må fylle ut et skjema på den lokale politistasjonen eller at man besøker immigrasjonskontoret. I mange land med en slik lov, vil lokale hoteller ta seg av registreringen (pass på å undersøke). I andre tilfeller er det kun de som bor utenfor turistinnkvarteringer som må registrere seg. Dette gjør derimot lovgivingen mindre tydelig, så kontroller før reise.
mt: Registration is an extra requirement in the visa process. In some countries you must register your stay and address you are at with local authorities. This can require you to fill out a form at the local police station or to visit the immigration office. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will take care of the registration (check this out). In other cases, only those living outside tourist enclaves must register. This makes the law less clear, so check before your trip.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: En fin måte å gjøre en forskjell på mens man reiser er å gjøre frivillig arbeid, og det handler om mer enn å bare gi. Det å leve og jobbe frivillig i et ukjent land er en fin metode for å kunne få kjennskap til en annen kultur, møte nye folk, bli kjent med seg selv, få et nytt perspektiv og til og med nye egenskaper. Det kan i tillegg være en flott metode for å strekke et budsjett og få et lengre opphold et sted, siden mange frivillige jobber enten kommer med rom og losji, eller til-og-med betaler en liten lønning.
mt: A great way to make a difference while traveling is to do volunteer work, and it's about more than just giving. Living and working voluntarily in an unknown land is a great way to get to know another culture, meet new people, get to know yourself, get a new perspective and even new qualities. It can also be a great way to stretch a budget and get a longer stay somewhere, since many volunteers either come with room and board, or at least pay a small salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Reising til Walt Disney World er en stor valfart for mange amerikanske familier. Det «typiske» besøket innebærer å fly inn til Orlandos internasjonale lufthavn, ta bussen til et Disney-hotell, bli værende omtrent en uke uten å forlate Disney-området og returnere hjem. Her finnes det uendelig med ulike variasjoner, men det er dette folk flest mener når de sier at de ""skal til Disney World"". Mange av billettene som selges på nettet via auksjonssteder som eBay og Craigslist er delvis brukte flerdagsbilletter for flere parker. Til tross for at dette er en regelmessig forekomst, er det ulovlig av Disney: billettene skal ikke føres over."
mt: "Rising to Walt Disney World is a big pilgrimage for many American families. The "typical" visit involves flying in to Orlando's international airport, taking the bus to a Disney hotel, staying about a week without leaving the Disney area, and returning home. There are endless variations, but this is what most people mean when they say they are "going to Disney World." Many of the tickets sold on the Internet through auction sites such as eBay and Craigslist are partially used multi-day tickets for several parks. Despite this being a regular occurrence, it is illegal by Disney: the tickets should not be transferred."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

Despite this being a regular occurrence, it is illegal by Disney: the tickets should not be transferred."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: De som planlegger å besøke land som blir ansett som en krigssone, bør få faglig opplæring. Et søk på Internett på «fiendtlige miljøkurs» vil trolig komme med adressen til et lokalt selskap. Et kurs vil normalt dekke alle problemstillingene nevnt her mye mer detaljert, vanligvis med praktisk erfaring. Et kurs vil vanligvis vare to til fem dager og innebærer skuespill, en del førstehjelp og av og til trening med våpen. Det er vanlig med bøker og magasiner som handler om villmarksoverlevelse, men publikasjoner som handler om krigssoner er det få av.
mt: Those planning to visit areas considered a war zone should receive professional training. A search on the Internet for "hostile environment course" will likely bring up the address of a local company. A course will typically cover all the issues mentioned here in much greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will typically last two to five days and will include role-playing, some first aid and sometimes training with weapons. There are usually books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival, but publications dealing with war zones are few and far between.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Det finnes ulike måter å rense vann på og noen er mer effektive mot konkrete trusler. I noen områder er det tilstrekkelig å koke vannet i et minutt, mens i andre trengs det flere minutter. Filtre er forskjellige når det gjelder effekt, og skulle du være i tvil, så kan du jo kjøpe vannet i en forseglet flaske fra et anerkjent selskap.
mt: There are different ways to purify water and some are more effective against specific threats. In some areas, it is sufficient to boil water for a minute, while in others it takes more time. Filters are different in terms of effectiveness, and if you are in doubt, you can buy water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Ripestrømmer er den tilbakevendende strømmen av bølger som bryter på stranden, et rev eller lignende. Grunnet undervannstopologien er returflyten konsentrert til noen dypere seksjoner, og en rask strøm slik at dypt vann kan dannes der. De fleste dødsfallene finner sted på grunn av utmattelse under forsøk i å svømme tilbake mot strømmen, noe som kan være svært problematisk. Med en gang du får deg ut av selve strømmen, er det ikke mer problematisk enn vanlig å skulle svømme tilbake. Prøv å ta sikte på et sted hvor du ikke blir dradd med igjen eller, avhengig av dyktigheten din og hvorvidt du har blitt lagt merke til, kan du kanskje vente på å bli reddet.
mt: Rip currents are the returning flow of waves that break on the beach, a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topography, the return flow is concentrated in some deeper sections, and a fast current so deep water can form there. Most deaths occur due to exhaustion during attempts to swim back against the current, which can be very problematic. As soon as you get out of the actual current, it is not more problematic than usual to swim back. Try to aim for a place where you are not dragged back with or, depending on your skill and whether you have been noticed, you can maybe wait to be rescued.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Vannveiene i innlandet kan være et kjekt tema å basere en reise på. Besøk for eksempel slottene i Loire-dalen, Rhine-dalen eller ta et cruise til interessante byer på Danube eller en båttur langs Erie-kanalen. De oppgir også ruter for populær turgåing og sykkelstier.
mt: The waterways of the interior can be a fun theme to base a trip on. Visit, for example, the castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or take a cruise to interesting cities on the Danube or a boat tour along the Erie Canal. They also list popular hiking and cycling routes.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: I nord-regionen er det avgrenset av Sahel, i sør og vest av Atlanterhavet. Damer: Det anbefales at reisende damer forteller at de er gift, uansett hva som faktisk er den sivile statusen. Det er også nyttig å gå med ring (men ikke en som ser for dyr ut. Kvinner bør forstå at kulturforskjeller kan føre til at det de vil se på som trakassering og det ikke er uvanlig å bli fulgt etter, tatt tak i armen etc. Vær bestemt på å si nei til menn, og ikke ha frykt for å stå på ditt (kulturelle ulikheter eller ikke, det gjør det fortsatt ikke akseptabelt!).
mt: In the north region it is bounded by the Sahel, in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that female travelers tell men that they are married, regardless of what their actual civil status is. It is also useful to wear a ring (but not one that looks too expensive. Women should understand that cultural differences can lead to them being harassed and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm etc. Be firm in saying no to men, and not be afraid to stand up for yourself (cultural differences or not, it does not make it acceptable!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Som motiv er dyreliv blant fotografens største utfordringer, og for å kunne ta et godt bilde trenger man en kombinasjon av flaks, tålmodighet, erfaring og egnet utstyr. Ofte blir naturfotografi tatt for gitt, men et bilde kan være verdt tusen ord akkurat som fotografering generelt. Naturfotografi krever ofte at man bruker en lang telelinse, men skal man ta bilde av for eksempel en flokk fugler eller bittesmå dyr vil man ha behov for andre typer linser. Mange eksotiske dyr er vanskelig å finne, og parker har noen ganger regler mot fotografering til kommersielle formål. Ville dyr kan være enten folkesky eller aggressive. Miljøet kan være kaldt, varmt eller fiendtlig på annet vis.
mt: As a motivation, wildlife photography is one of the photographer's greatest challenges, and to be able to take a good picture you need a combination of luck, patience, experience and appropriate equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but a picture can be worth a thousand words just as photography in general. Wildlife photography often requires the use of a long telephoto lens, but if you want to take pictures of a flock of birds or tiny animals you will need other types of lenses. Many exotic animals are difficult to find, and parks have sometimes rules against photography for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be either friendly or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or hostile in other ways.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Alle som skal kjøre i høyden eller over fjellpass bør ta hensyn til muligheten for snø, is eller kulde. Friksjonen er lav, på is- og snødekte veier kan du derfor ikke kjøre som du ville gjort på bar asfalt. I løpet av snøstormer kan det komme nok snø til at du faller i løpet av svært kort tid. Synlighet kan også være begrenset ved fallende eller blåsende snø eller ved kondensering eller is på kjøretøyvinduer. På den andre siden er isete og snøfylte forhold normalt i mange land, og trafikken går for det meste uavbrutt hele året rundt.
mt: All drivers should take into account the possibility of snow, ice or cold. Friction is low, on ice and snow-covered roads you can not drive as you would on bare asphalt. During snowstorms, it can come enough snow that you fall in a very short time. Visibility can also be limited by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic usually goes uninterrupted all year round.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Med mindre du er diplomat, betyr jobber i utlandet generelt at du vil betale skatt til det landet du bor i. Inntektsskatt er strukturert forskjellig i ulike land, og skattesatsene og -klassene varierer stort fra land til land. I noen føderale nasjoner, som for eksempel USA og Canada, er inntektsskatt pålagt både på det føderale og på det lokale nivået, slik at satsene og støttene kan være ulik fra område til område.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad generally means you will pay taxes to the country you live in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and tax rates and brackets vary greatly from country to country. In some federal nations, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal and local levels, so that rates and credits can be different from area to area.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: En verdensmesse (vanligvis kalt verdenseksposisjon eller bare ekspo) er stor internasjonal festival for kunst og vitenskap. Land deltar ved å presentere kunstneriske og pedagogiske fremstillinger i nasjonalpaviljonger for å fremvise problemer på planeten, eller kulturen og historien til landet sitt. Internasjonale hortikulturelle utstillinger er spesialiserte arrangementer med blomsterutstillinger, botaniske hager og alt annet som har å gjøre med planter. På tross av at de i teorien kan oppstå hvert år (så lenge de er i ulike land), så skjer ikke det i praksis. Disse arrangementene varer normalt alt fra tre til seks måneder, og avholdes på områder med minst 50 hektar.
mt: A world's fair (also known as a world's exposition or simply expo) is a large international exhibition designed as an experiential show. Countries participate at such events by presenting cultural and educational exhibitions in national pavilions, in order to showcase their problems, or their culture and history. Horticultural expositions are specialized events with flower exhibitions, botanical gardens and all else related to plants. Despite the fact that they can theoretically occur every year (as long as they are in different countries), they do not in practice. These events usually last from three to six months, and are held on areas of at least 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: De fleste dyrene i parken er vant til å se mennesker, men likevel, dyrene er ville og bør ikke gis mat eller forstyrres. Du bør holde deg minst 100 meter unna bjørn og ulv ifølge parkmyndighetene, og 25 meter fra alle andre ville dyr! Bison, elg, hjort, bjørn og nesten alle store dyr kan angripe uansett hvor fredsommelige de kan se ut. Årlig får titalls av besøkende skader da de ikke har holdt forsvarlig distanse. Disse dyrene er store, ville, og kan være farlige, så gi dem plassen sin. Vær i tillegg obs på at lukter tiltrekker bjørner og annet dyreliv, så unngå å bære eller koke luktrike måltider og behold en ren leir.
mt: Most of the animals in the park are used to seeing people, but still, the animals are wild and should not be fed or disturbed. You should keep at least 100 meters away from bears and wolves according to park authorities, and 25 meters from all other wild animals! Bison, elk, deer, bears and almost all large animals can attack regardless of how peaceful they may seem. Annually, dozens of visitors are injured when they do not keep a safe distance. These animals are large, wild, and can be dangerous, so give them their space. Be also aware that scents attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking aromatic meals and keep a clean camp.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
